items.en: Are you sure you want to quit editing the config? Changes will not be saved!
items.zh: 您确定要取消编辑吗？更改将不会被保存！
不是一个有效的数字！（整数）
不是一个有效的数字！（长整数）
不是一个有效的数字！（浮点数）
不是一个有效的数字！（双精度浮点数）

items.en: One of your modified settings requires Minecraft to be restarted. Do you want to proceed?
items.zh: 您修改的设置要求Minecraft重新启动。您想要继续吗？

items.en: You are a mod developer and you want to use %1$s? Go on the %2$s to get started. You can also %3$s.
items.zh: 你是模组开发者并且想要使用%1$s？前往%2$s入门。你也可以%3$s。

items.en: click here to open the Minecraft options file for no specific reason
items.zh: 点击此处打开Minecraft选项文件，没有特定原因

items.en: Cloth Config is required to configure Dynamic FPS from within Minecraft.
items.zh: 需要 Cloth Config 才能在 Minecraft 中配置动态帧率。

items.en: Either install Cloth Config, edit the config file, or use the default settings instead.
items.zh: 要么安装 Cloth Config，要么编辑配置文件，要么使用默认设置。

items.en: Minutes without input until Dynamic FPS activates the Idle state while the game is focused.
items.zh: 在处于焦点状态下，需要多长时间激活空闲状态。

items.en: Always activate Idle state when inactive for too long.
items.zh: 当长时间无活动时，始终激活空闲状态。

items.en: Disable Dynamic FPS idling. Uses the vanilla setting instead.
items.zh: 禁用动态帧率的空闲功能。改用原版设置。

items.en: Enable the Idle state when inactive for too long and on battery.
items.zh: 在使用电池且长时间无活动时，启用空闲状态。
解除菜单 FPS 限制

items.en: Remove the 60 FPS limit in the main menu.
items.zh: 移除主菜单中的 60 帧/秒限制。

items.en: Ignore accidental input when clicking on the unfocused game window.
Toggle all battery-related features on or off.
items.zh: 开启或关闭所有与电池相关的功能。

items.en: Automatically enable the On Battery state when on battery.
items.zh: 在使用电池时自动启用电池状态。

items.en: Receive in-game notifications about your battery status.
items.zh: 在游戏中接收有关电池状态的通知。

items.en: Set which battery charge level is considered critical.
Set the speed at which the game volume will be adjusted per second.
items.zh: 设置每秒游戏音量调整的速度。

items.en: Minimal graphics cause the world to reload!
items.zh: 最小的图形也会导致世界重新加载！

items.en: Whether to keep displaying or delay toast notifications
items.zh: 是否持续显示或延迟显示提示通知

items.en: Free up unused memory when switching to this status
items.zh: 切换到此状态时释放未使用的内存

items.en: Using the battery features requires an additional library.
items.zh: 使用电池功能需要额外的库。

items.en: Set whether the mod may download this component on your behalf.
items.zh: 设置是否允许该模组为您下载此组件。

items.en: Reduce resource usage while Minecraft is in the background or idle.
items.zh: 动态限制游戏帧率，使 Minecraft 处于后台时占用更少的资源。
将本地游戏托管在域名[%s]上

items.en: Local game no longer publicly hosted
items.zh: 不再公开托管本地游戏
本地游戏没有被公开托管
跳过被剔除的 Tick 更新

items.en: Entities selected in this tab will not have their tick method optimized when culled. This can be useful for entities that need to tick for certain functionality, such as Boats.
items.zh: 此选项卡内的实体不参与 Tick 更新。这适用于需要刻更新来实现某些功能的实体，例如实体船。

items.en: Entities selected in this tab will not be culled at all. This is mainly needed for client-side entities or entities that need to be rendered regardless of their visibility.
items.zh: 在这个选项卡中选中的实体根本不会被剔除。这主要用于客户端实体，或者那些无论是否可见都需要被渲染的实体。

items.en: Block entities selected in this tab will not be culled at all. This is mainly needed for block entities that need to be rendered regardless of their visibility.
items.zh: 在这个选项卡中选中的方块实体根本不会被剔除。这主要用于那些无论是否可见都需要被渲染的方块实体。
透过墙壁渲染名字标签

items.en: When turned off, culled entities will not have their nametags rendered through walls.
items.zh: 关闭后，被剔除的实体的名字标签将不会透过墙壁渲染。

items.en: When turned on, entities that are culled will not tick. This can improve performance in some cases, but may cause issues with certain mods. Consider the finer control options in the other tab.
items.zh: 开启后，被剔除的实体将不会进行 Tick 更新。这在某些情况下可以提高性能，但可能会导致某些模组出现问题。可以考虑在其他选项卡中使用更精细的控制选项。

items.en: When turned on, the F3 debug info will not show culling information.
items.zh: 开启后，F3 调试信息将不会显示剔除信息。

items.en: When turned on, culling of entities will be skipped entirely. This can be useful for debugging or when you want to disable culling temporarily.
items.zh: 开启后，将完全跳过实体的剔除。这在你调试时很有用，或者当你想要临时禁用剔除实体功能时也很方便。

items.en: When turned on, culling of block entities will be skipped entirely. This can be useful for debugging or when you want to disable culling temporarily.
items.zh: 开启后，将完全跳过方块实体的剔除。这在你调试时很有用，或者当你想要临时禁用剔除功能时也很方便。

items.en: When turned on, block entity state extraction will be culled based on the camera's view frustum. This can improve performance in case your modloader/another mod doesn't do this already.
In 1.21.9+ armor no longer naturally copies the custom animations of the base model, this replicates that old behaviour.

items.zh: 每个实体只播放一次模型动画

items.en:
On by default
this setting makes it so entity models will animate only once per each entity rendered
this will be entirely normal in game however mobs visible in
 inventory screens may flicker weirdly
 especially if it represents a real mob in the world you can already see
items.zh:
默认开启
此设置使每个渲染的实体模型仅播放一次动画
游戏内表现完全正常，但
物品栏界面显示的生物可能会出现诡异闪烁
特别是当该模型对应着世界中已存在的真实生物时

items.en: If enabled this will make EMF try to load a fallback .properties file if the regular one cannot be found\nE.G. pig_baby.jem will fall back to using pig.properties if pig_baby.properties doesn't exist.\nOptiFine only works with these fallbacks and in fact does not allow the per model example like pig_baby.properties
items.zh: 启用后，当常规.properties文件缺失时EMF将尝试加载备用文件\n例如：若pig_baby.properties不存在，pig_baby.jem将回退使用pig.properties\nOptiFine仅支持这种回退机制，实际上不允许使用类似pig_baby.properties的每模型专属配置
显示资源重载错误提示

items.en: If enabled, this will show a toast message when errors occurred during a resource reload\nThis can be helpful to know if something went wrong during the reload
items.zh: 启用后，资源重载过程中出现错误时将显示弹窗提示\n有助于了解重载期间是否发生异常

items.en: Check your log or EMF settings for details
items.zh: 详情请查看日志或EMF设置

items.en: EMF can log these errors again from, models > debug >
items.zh: 可通过 模型>调试> 重新记录这些错误
重新记录所有加载错误

items.en: Log all loading errors again (with stacktrace)
items.zh: 重新记录所有加载错误（含堆栈追踪）

items.en: This option will re-print all the encountered EMF loading errors, from the last resource reload, back into the log in the order they were encountered\nNot all errors here will be very helpful as they may be missing surrounding log context
items.zh: 此选项将按出现顺序重新输出\n最后一次资源重载时EMF遇到的所有加载错误日志\n由于缺少上下文环境，并非所有错误信息都具有参考价值

items.en:
OptiFine floors all UV values in custom box UV's
i.e. it makes them all whole numbers.
This setting will make EMF do the same
EMF will also log if it finds a model that doesn't have floored UVs
items.zh:
OptiFine会对自定义立方体的UV值执行取整操作
（即转为整数）
此设置将使EMF采取相同行为
EMF会同时记录未取整UV值的模型信息

items.en:
If enabled this will enforce OptiFine's CEM syntax limitations, such as
bone ids in animations cannot start with _ or numbers.
numbers cannot start with '.' such as '.9'
bones named 'render' cannot be referenced by animations
This setting when enabled will log errors for any animations that violate these rules and invalidate them.
items.zh:
启用后将强制实施OptiFine的CEM语法规范，例如：
动画中的骨骼ID不能以_或数字开头
数字不能以.开头（如.9）
名为'render'的骨骼不能被动画引用
启用时，将记录违反规则的动画错误并使其失效

items.en: Not all parts visible here may export\nonly declared parts will.\nYou can find out the missing part's transform details by checking the game log after exporting.
items.zh: 此处可见的部件不一定都能导出\n仅声明过的部件可以导出\n导出后可通过游戏日志查看缺失部件的变换详情
子文件夹模型必须存在变体

items.en:
In OptiFine the subfolder option for model files only works if that model variates.
E.G. 'optifine/cem/skeleton/skeleton.jem' will only load if it has variants
such as 'optifine/cem/skeleton/skeleton2.jem' or a .properties file
This setting will make EMF also enforce this,
EMF will log this if it finds a model that doesn't variate
items.zh:
在OptiFine中，模型文件的子文件夹选项
仅在该模型存在变体时生效
例如：'optifine/cem/skeleton/skeleton.jem'仅在存在
'skeleton2.jem'变体或.properties文件时才会加载
此设置将使EMF同样强制执行该规则
EMF会记录未配置变体的模型信息

items.en: Debug options, can be helpful to figure some things out
items.zh: 调试选项，可用于排查问题

items.en: Show EMF debug data on entity right click
items.zh: 右键实体时显示EMF调试数据

items.en: If enabled, this will print out EMf debug info into\nthe log and chat when an entity is right clicked.
items.zh: 启用后，右键点击实体时\n将在日志和聊天栏输出EMF调试信息
增强方块实体(EBE)模组补丁

items.en:
If enabled, this will allow EMF to modify the EBE Mod's config
to disable EBE for certain block entities if that
Block Entity actually has a custom EMF model loaded.
EMF cannot automatically re enable these settings afterwards,
 you will have to do that manually if desired.
items.zh:
启用后，当方块实体已加载自定义EMF模型时
允许EMF修改EBE模组配置来禁用对应方块实体的增强渲染
EMF无法自动恢复这些设置
如需恢复需手动操作

items.en: Try to prevent EMF models being overridden
Will try and force entity renderers to use the models set by EMF\n this can override vanilla models changed by other mods\n this wont work with all mods
items.zh: 尝试强制实体渲染器使用EMF设置的模型\n这将覆盖其他模组修改的原版模型\n不保证对所有模组生效

items.en: abs(x)\nGet the absolute value of a number. Will turn negative numbers positive
items.zh: abs(x)\n获取数值的绝对值。将负数转为正数

items.en: acos(x)\nGet the arc cosine of x
asin(x)\nGet the arc sine of x
atan(x)\nGet the arc tangent of x
atan2(y, x)\nGet the angle between the positive x-axis and the point (x, y)
items.zh: atan2(y, x)\n求x轴正方向与点(x,y)之间的夹角

items.en: catmullrom(k, x, y, z, w)\nInterpolates between x and y using the catmull-rom spline function with control points z and w
items.zh: catmullrom(k, x, y, z, w)\n使用控制点z和w的catmull-rom样条函数在x与y之间插值

items.en: ceil(x)\nRound x up to the nearest whole number
clamp(x, min, max)\nLimits a number to be between min and max values
items.zh: clamp(x, min, max)\n将数值限制在min与max之间

items.en:
nbt(x,y)
Boolean function that returns true if the entity has the NBT tag x matching the query y.
x is equivalent to what comes after 'nbt.<n>.' in the NBT random property.
y is equivalent to what comes after the '=' in the NBT random property.
e.g. 'nbt.1.SleepingX=exists:true' in the NBT property will be 'nbt(SleepingX,exists:true) in the animation function'.
items.zh:
nbt(x,y)
布尔函数，当实体NBT标签x符合查询y时返回true
x对应NBT随机属性中'nbt.<n>.'后的内容
y对应NBT随机属性中'='后的内容
例如：NBT属性中的'nbt.1.SleepingX=exists:true'
在动画函数中应写作'nbt(SleepingX,exists:true)'

items.en: cubicbezier(k, x, y, z, w)\nInterpolates between x and y using the cubic bezier spline function with control points z and w
items.zh: cubicbezier(k, x, y, z, w)\n使用控制点z和w的三次贝塞尔样条函数在x与y之间插值

items.en: degdiff(x, y)\nReturns the shortest angular degree difference between two degree values x and y
items.zh: degdiff(x, y)\n返回两个角度值x与y之间的最小角度差

items.en: exp(x)\nGet e (Euler's constant) raised to the power of x
floor(x)\nRound x down to the nearest whole number
fmod(x, y)\nSimilar to the % operator, but the returned value always has the same sign as the divisor
items.zh: fmod(x, y)\n类似%运算符，但返回值符号始终与除数相同

items.en: frac(x)\nGet the fractional part of x (what's behind the decimal point)
items.zh: frac(x)\n获取x的小数部分(小数点后的数值)

items.en: hermite(k, x, y, z, w)\nInterpolates between x and y using the hermite spline function with control points z and w
items.zh: hermite(k, x, y, z, w)\n使用控制点z和w的hermite样条函数在x与y之间插值

items.en: if(cond, val, [cond2, val2, ...], val_else)\nSelect a value based one or more conditions
items.zh: if(cond, val, [cond2, val2, ...], val_else)\n根据一个或多个条件选择返回值

items.en: keyframe(k, a, b, c,...)\nInterpolates smoothly between values based on the current frame 'k' and the keyframes. 'a' is 'k=0', 'b' is 'k=1', 'c' is 'k=2' etc.
items.zh: keyframe(k, a, b, c,...)\n基于当前帧'k'和关键帧平滑插值。'a'对应'k=0'，'b'对应'k=1'，'c'对应'k=2'等

items.en: keyframeloop(k, a, b, c,...)\nInterpolates smoothly between values based on the current frame 'k' and the keyframes. 'a' is 'k=0', 'b' is 'k=1', 'c' is 'k=2' etc. but loops the animation back to frame 'a' when 'k' is greater than the number of keyframes
items.zh: keyframeloop(k, a, b, c,...)\n基于当前帧'k'和关键帧平滑插值。'a'对应'k=0'，'b'对应'k=1'，'c'对应'k=2'等，当'k'超过关键帧数量时循环回到'a'

items.en: lerp(k, x, y)\nLinear interpolation between X and Y
items.zh: lerp(k, x, y)\nX与Y之间的线性插值

items.en: log(x)\nGet the natural logarithm of x
max(x, y, ...)\nGet the largest number from a list of numbers
items.zh: max(x, y, ...)\n从数值列表中获取最大值

items.en: min(x, y ,...)\nGet the smallest number from a list of numbers
items.zh: min(x, y ,...)\n从数值列表中获取最小值

items.en: pow(x, y)\nGet x raised to the power of y
print(id, n, x)\nPrints the value \"x\" every N-th frame
items.zh: print(id, n, x)\n每N帧打印一次数值\"x\"

items.en: printb(id, n, x)\nPrints the boolean value \"x\" every N-th frame
items.zh: printb(id, n, x)\n每N帧打印一次布尔值\"x\"

items.en: quadbezier(k, x, y, z)\nInterpolates between x and y using the quadratic bezier spline function with control point z
items.zh: quadbezier(k, x, y, z)\n使用控制点z的二次贝塞尔样条函数在x与y之间插值

items.en: raddiff(x, y)\nReturns the shortest angular radian difference between two radian values x and y
items.zh: raddiff(x, y)\n返回两个弧度值x与y之间的最小弧度差

items.en: random(seed)\nRandom number from 0 to 1. Providing a seed will always return the same result. The seed is optional
items.zh: random(seed)\n生成0到1的随机数。提供种子将始终返回相同结果(种子可选)

items.en: round(x)\nRound x to nearest whole number
signum(x)\nGet the sign of x (positive or negative)
between(x, min, max)\nCheck if a value is between min and max values
items.zh: between(x, min, max)\n检查数值是否在min与max之间

items.en: equals(x, y, epsilon)\nCompare two float values with error margin
items.zh: equals(x, y, epsilon)\n带误差范围的浮点数比较

items.en: in(x, val1, val2, ...)\nCheck if a value equals one of several values
items.zh: in(x, val1, val2, ...)\n检查数值是否等于给定值之一

items.en: sqrt(x)\nGet the square root of x
if(cond, val, [cond2, val2, ...], val_else)\nSelect a value based one or more conditions\nOnly returns boolean values
items.zh: if(cond, val, [cond2, val2, ...], val_else)\n根据一个或多个条件选择返回值\n仅返回布尔值

items.en: random(seed)\nRandom boolean true|false. Providing a seed will always return the same result. The seed is optional
items.zh: random(seed)\n随机返回true/false。提供种子将始终返回相同结果(种子可选)

items.en:
catch(x,c,id)
Will return x, however if x is NaN or causes some other animation error then c will get returned instead.
id is optional, if it is added the catch function will print the reason c was used to the game log with this id
Primarily intended for animation debugging, if there is a chance something will trigger this you should really be fixing that instead.
items.zh:
catch(x,c,id)
正常情况下返回x，若x为NaN或引发动画错误则返回c
id为可选参数，若提供则会在游戏日志中记录使用c的原因
主要用于动画调试，若可能触发此机制应优先修复问题本身

items.en: wrapdeg(x)\nWraps the degree value x to the range -180 to 180 that it matches
items.zh: wrapdeg(x)\n将角度值x规范到-180到180范围内

items.en: wraprad(x)\nWraps the radian value x to the range -pi to pi that it matches
items.zh: wraprad(x)\n将弧度值x规范到-π到π范围内

items.en:
If enabled this will reduce the Level of Detail (LOD)
impact of the above setting according to the mobs size.
Larger mobs will have less noticeable skipped frames
than smaller mobs
items.zh:
启用后，将根据生物体型大小
降低上述设置的细节层级(LOD)影响
较大体型的生物相比小型生物
跳帧现象会更不明显

items.en:
Sets the distance at which animations will begin to skip frames,
lower the Level of Detail (LOD), This can help with performance
None = no frame skipping
16 = will skip 1 frame for every 16 blocks distance from player
Lower numbers mean more skipped frames and more performance gain
but of course animations will become more noticeably lower
framerate the closer the LOD distance is set
items.zh:
设置动画开始跳帧的触发距离
降低细节层级(LOD)可提升性能
无 = 不跳帧
16 = 每远离玩家16格跳1帧
数值越小跳帧越多性能越好
但动画帧率下降会越明显

items.en: Prints animation math debug data to the log\nWARNING EXTREMELY LAG INDUCING!
items.zh: 将动画数学运算调试数据输出到日志\n警告：将导致严重卡顿！

items.en: Prints model creation debug data to the log
items.zh: 将模型创建调试数据输出到日志

items.en:
If enabled this will reduce the Level of Detail (LOD)
impact of the above setting according to your fps.
Only applies when below 60 fps as skipped frames
become increasingly noticeable at lower fps
items.zh: 启用后，当帧率低于60时\n将根据当前帧率降低上述LOD设置的影响\n跳帧现象在低帧率下会更为明显

items.en: Various options for fundamental features or mod compatibility fixes
items.zh: 基础功能选项与模组兼容性修复

items.en: Will only render the original vanilla model parts on death if physics mod is enabled\n this partially works but is not a perfect solution
items.zh: 启用物理模组时，仅在死亡时渲染原始原版模型部件\n此为部分解决方案，效果不完美

items.en:
this will print out the part information or a complete .jem file
for any model that EMF can access EVERY RELOAD!!
The .jem files can be found in "MC_DIRECTORY/emf/export" after a reload
The .jem files are Blockbench ready with
correct pivots boxes and uvs
Unknown models refers to models not supported by OptiFine CEM
items.zh:
每次重载时都会输出部件信息或完整.jem文件！
.jem文件可在重载后于"MC_DIRECTORY/emf/export"目录找到
导出的.jem文件已适配Blockbench
包含正确的枢轴点、碰撞箱和UV坐标
未知模型指OptiFine CEM不支持的模型

items.en: Makes the above render setting only apply to entity being hovered over by the client.\nI.E. directly looked at by you.
items.zh: 使上方渲染设置仅对客户端悬停的实体生效\n即玩家直接注视的实体

items.en:
Changes how custom model parts are rendered, this does not affect vanilla model parts.
Normal = normal rendering
Flash green = the custom parts will flash green
Outlines = the outlines of the model parts will render
Disabled = custom model parts will not render
items.zh:
改变自定义模型部件的渲染方式(不影响原版部件)
正常 = 标准渲染
绿色闪烁 = 部件闪烁绿色
线框 = 显示部件轮廓
禁用 = 不渲染自定义部件

items.en: EMF will try to replace missing part in the .jem\n model file with the vanilla counterpart
items.zh: EMF将尝试用原版对应部件替换.jem模型中缺失的部件

items.en:
This controls how EMF handles rendering sub-models that have an override texture set
for example if a creeper model has a separate texture for the head sub-model
There are two ways to do this, rely on my code, or rely on a quirk of the Iris mod
My code 'works' but I am not an expert with render buffers and it may cause issues
The Iris quirk uses a pretty straightforward and seemingly safe/stable method but i'm told its not intended Iris behaviour
The Iris option will default to the EMF code if Iris isn't installed
this should almost always be left on default except when debugging texture overrides in sub-models
items.zh:
控制EMF如何处理设置了覆盖纹理的子模型
(例如苦力怕模型头部有独立纹理时)
有两种实现方式：使用我的代码，或利用Iris模组的特性
我的代码'可用'但非专业渲染缓冲方案，可能存在问题
Iris特性采用简单稳定的方法(但据称并非Iris设计用途)
未安装Iris时自动回退到EMF代码
除调试子模型纹理外，通常应保持默认设置

items.en: Optional tools to help with model making or distinguishing custom models
items.zh: 辅助建模或区分自定义模型的可选工具

items.en:
Sets how often a mobs model will
update for changes like health & age
Never = never update
Slow = 3-5 seconds
Average = about 1 second
Fast = less than a second
Instant = instant (possible lag with hundred of mobs)
items.zh:
设置生物模型更新状态(如生命值、年龄)的间隔
从不 = 不更新
慢速 = 3-5秒
中速 = 约1秒
快速 = 小于1秒
即时 = 实时更新(数百生物时可能卡顿)

items.en: This setting will render the vanilla model alongside the custom one for comparison\nIt will not animate and thus might be positioned a bit weird
items.zh: 同时渲染原版模型用于对比\n该模型不会动画，位置可能显示异常

items.en: True if the entity is swinging its right arm. Note false does not mean the other arm is swinging
items.zh: true表示正在挥动右臂(为false不表示左臂在挥动)

items.en: True if the entity is swinging its left arm. Note false does not mean the other arm is swinging
items.zh: true表示正在挥动左臂(为false不表示右臂在挥动)

items.en: The remaining entity angry time in ticks. Starts with 400-780 while agressive, and then counts down to 0 when the target is lost
items.zh: 实体剩余愤怒时间(tick)\n攻击时初始值400-780，失去目标后递减至0

items.en: The current day time in ticks (0-24000)
The time the entity is dead. Counts up from 0 to 20
The current dimension. Overworld: 0, Nether: -1, End: 1
items.zh: 当前维度\n主世界:0 下界:-1 末地:1

实体与客户端玩家的距离(方块)

虽然distance变量是为便利添加的，但在OptiFine中可通过以下代码实现相同效果：
"var.distance": "sqrt(pow(pos_x -player_pos_x, 2) + pow(pos_y - player_pos_y, 2) + pow(pos_z - player_pos_z, 2))"

items.en:
Entity variables are specified in the format "var.<name>" (float) or "varb.<name>" (boolean) 

The name can be any string, for example "var.xyz", "var.last_rx", etc.

The variable is attached to the rendered entity and has a default value 0 or false.

Entity variables are useful for storing animation data between frames.
items.zh:
实体变量格式为"var.<名称>"(浮点)或"varb.<名称>"(布尔)

名称可为任意字符串，如"var.xyz"、"var.last_rx"等

变量附着于渲染实体，默认值0或false

用于在帧间存储动画数据

items.zh: 实体下方流体深度(未浸入时为0)

items.en: The depth of the fluid above a submerged entity, 0 if not submerged

items.en: The time the entity is hurt for. Counts down from 10 to 0

items.en: If the entity is blocking with a shield
items.zh: 实体是否正在用盾牌格挡

items.en: If the entity is on fire
If the entity is in its baby state

items.en: If the entity has the Glowing effect
items.zh: 实体是否具有发光效果

items.en: If the entity is taking damage
items.zh: 实体是否正在受到伤害

items.en: The index of the current frame (0 to 720719, then resets to 0)
If a trident is impaled in the ground

If the entity is being held in your hand
If the entity is in an item frame

items.en: If the entity is touching lava
If the entity is touching water
If the entity has the Invisibility effect/NBT tag
items.zh: 实体是否具有隐身效果/NBT标签

items.en: If the entity is touching the ground
If the entity is worn on another entity's head
items.zh: 实体是否被穿戴在另一实体头部

items.en: If a parrot is sitting on your shoulder
items.zh: 鹦鹉是否停在玩家肩上

items.en: If the entity is being ridden by another entity
items.zh: 实体是否正被另一实体骑乘

items.en: If the entity is riding another entity
items.zh: 实体是否正在骑乘另一实体
猫/狼/鹦鹉是否处于坐姿

items.en: If a living mob is jumping
If the entity is inside water/rain

items.en: If the player is right handed
If the game is currently rendering the first person hand

items.en: Limb movement speed. Ranges from 0 to 1 (still = 0, sprinting = 1)
items.zh: 肢体移动速度(静止=0，疾跑=1)

items.en: Limb animation counter. Counts up in ticks when the entity moves
items.zh: 肢体动画计数器(实体移动时tick递增)

items.en:
Model variables are specified in the format
 "<model>.<variable_name>"

The model can be:
 "this" - current custom model
 "part" - the original part model to which the custom model is attached
 "<part>" - original model by part name
 "<id>" - custom model by ID
 "<part>:<sub_id>:<sub_sub_id>:..." - (hierarchical) start with original model by part name, then find children by ID
 "<id>:<sub_id>:<sub_sub_id>:..." - (hierarchical) start with model by ID, then find children by ID

The first model found by part name or ID is used if there are duplicates.
The model search by ID is deep, also when used in a hierarchical specification. 

The hierarchical specification allows model groups (json part models) to be reused for different parts. 
For example one hand model ("shoulder:upper_arm:elbow:forearm:palm:finger[1.5]" can be used for both left and right hand.
The animation can use "left_hand:finger1" for the left thumb and "right_hand:finger1" for the right thumb. 
The intermediate parents in the hierarchical specification can be skipped. 

Variable names
 tx, ty, tz    - Translation x, y, z
 rx, ry, rz    - Rotation x, y, z
 sx, sy, sz    - Scale x, y, z
 visible       - Show model and submodels (boolean)
 visible_boxes - Show model only, does not affect submodels (boolean)
items.zh:
模型变量格式为
"<模型>.<变量名>"

可用模型标识：
"this" - 当前自定义模型
"part" - 自定义模型附加的原始部件模型
"<部件名>" - 通过部件名指定原始模型
"<ID>" - 通过ID指定自定义模型
"<部件名>:<子ID>:<子子ID>:..." - (层级结构)从部件名开始查找子级
"<ID>:<子ID>:<子子ID>:..." - (层级结构)从模型ID开始查找子级

存在重复时使用首个匹配的模型
ID搜索为深度搜索

层级结构允许模型组(json部件模型)复用
例如手部模型("shoulder:upper_arm:elbow:forearm:palm:finger[1.5]")可同时用于左右手
动画可使用"left_hand:finger1"指代左手拇指
"right_hand:finger1"指代右手拇指
层级中的中间父级可省略

可用变量名：
tx, ty, tz - 平移坐标
rx, ry, rz - 旋转角度
sx, sy, sz - 缩放比例
visible - 显示模型及子模型(布尔值)
visible_boxes - 仅显示当前模型(不影响子模型)

items.en: The entity's current movement in the direction they are facing. Ranges from -1 to 1 denoting the Y axis intercept of a unit circle of the players current movement vector. 1 is forward, -1 is backward
items.zh: 实体当前面朝方向的移动值(-1到1)\n表示玩家移动向量在单位圆Y轴上的投影\n1=前进 -1=后退

items.en: The entity's current movement in the direction 90 degrees to the right of their facing direction. Ranges from -1 to 1 denoting the X axis intercept of a unit circle of the players current movement vector.
items.zh: 实体当前右侧90度方向的移动值(-1到1)\n表示玩家移动向量在单位圆X轴上的投影

items.en: Not a number\nthrows an exception during runtime\nused for debugging
items.zh: 非数值\n运行时抛出异常\n用于调试

items.en: If the entity is currently using an item, e.g. player right clicking with a bucket
items.zh: 实体是否正在使用物品\n如玩家右键使用水桶

items.en: If an item is held in the entities right hand slot
items.zh: 实体右手槽位是否持有物品

items.en: If an item is held in the entities left hand slot
items.zh: 实体左手槽位是否持有物品

items.en: The client players current world position
items.zh: 客户端玩家当前世界坐标

items.en: The client players current world rotation. North is 0
items.zh: 客户端玩家当前世界旋转角度(北方为0)

items.en:
Render variables
 render.shadow_size
 - The size of the shadow underneath an entity
 render.shadow_opacity
 - How transparent the shadow is
 render.shadow_offset_x, render.shadow_offset_z
 - The location of the shadow
  render.leash_offset_x, render.leash_offset_y, render.leash_offset_z
 - The position of the point the leash attaches to
items.zh:
渲染变量
render.shadow_size - 实体阴影大小
render.shadow_opacity - 阴影透明度
render.shadow_offset_x/z - 阴影位置
render.leash_offset_x/y/z - 栓绳连接点位置

items.en: The entities current world rotation. North is 0
items.zh: 实体当前世界旋转角度(北方为0)

items.en: The index of the current matching random models rule. Defaults to 0
items.zh: 当前匹配的随机模型规则索引(默认为0)

items.en: How far through an attack the entity is. Counts up from 0 to 1
items.zh: 实体攻击动作进度(0到1递增)

items.en: The total game time in ticks, not related to the daylight cycle
items.zh: 游戏总时长(tick数，与昼夜周期无关)

items.en: Sets whether or not to load the given .jem model file
items.zh: 设置是否加载指定的.jem模型文件

items.en:
Exports this model as .jem file to the directory "MC_DIRECTORY/emf/export"
This file can be opened in Blockbench and contains all the necessary data for a custom model
including pivot points, boxes, and UVs
Additional data will also be printed in the log, such as where to put this .jem file for use in a resource pack.
items.zh:
将模型导出为.jem文件至"MC_DIRECTORY/emf/export"目录
该文件可在Blockbench中打开，包含自定义模型所需全部数据
包括枢轴点、碰撞箱和UV坐标
日志中将额外输出该.jem文件在资源包中的存放位置说明

items.en: arrow.jem & spectral_arrow.jem will not appear here, but are both supported
items.zh: arrow.jem和spectral_arrow.jem不会在此显示，但均受支持

items.en: \nplayer_cape.jem will not appear here, but is also supported, it is an exact copy of player.jem but only the 'cloak' part
items.zh: player_cape.jem不会在此显示，但也受支持\n该模型是player.jem的精确副本，仅包含'cloak'部件

items.en: If enabled this will only apply custom player models to your own player\nignoring all others in multiplayer
items.zh: 启用后仅对自身玩家应用自定义模型\n多人游戏中忽略其他玩家模型

items.en: This section provides details on the math functions and variables available for use in EMF custom entity model animations.\nIncluding anything added to EMF from another mod using it's API.\nEach function and variable will provide more details when clicked on.
items.zh: 本节提供EMF自定义实体模型动画可用数学函数和变量的详细信息\n包括通过API从其他模组添加的内容\n点击每个函数/变量可查看详细说明

items.en: A list of all the math variables currently registered for use in EMF custom entity model animations.\nEach variable will provide more details when clicked on.
items.zh: EMF自定义实体模型动画当前注册的所有数学变量列表\n点击每个变量可查看详细说明

items.en: A list of all the math functions currently registered for use in EMF custom entity model animations.\nEach function will provide more details when clicked on.
items.zh: EMF自定义实体模型动画当前注册的所有数学函数列表\n点击每个函数可查看详细说明

items.en:
Model Suffix (Optional)
matches the last random model suffix number that the entities model was set to
defaults to 0
Example: modelSuffix.1= 2 4 6
§amodelSuffix.<n>=<list>
items.zh:
模型后缀(可选)
匹配实体模型设置的最后一个随机模型后缀编号
默认为0
示例: modelSuffix.1= 2 4 6
§amodelSuffix.<n>=<列表>

items.en:
Model Rule (Optional)
matches the last random model rule number that the entities model matched against
defaults to 0
Example: modelRule.1= 2 4 6
§amodelRule.<n>=<list>
items.zh:
模型规则(可选)
匹配实体模型最后符合的随机模型规则编号
默认为0
示例: modelRule.1= 2 4 6
§amodelRule.<n>=<列表>

items.en:
Entity Variable Float (Optional)
matches the CEM animation variable value of the entity
defaults to 0
Example: (for animation variable 'var.xyz') var.1.xyz= 2 4 6
§avar.<n>.<variable>=<list>
items.zh:
实体浮点变量(可选)
匹配实体的CEM动画变量值
默认为0
示例: (动画变量'var.xyz') var.1.xyz= 2 4 6
§avar.<n>.<变量>=<列表>

items.en:
Entity Variable Boolean (Optional)
matches the CEM animation variable value of the entity
defaults to false
Example: (for animation variable 'varb.xyz') varb.1.xyz=true
§avarb.<n>.<variable>=<true|false>
items.zh:
实体布尔变量(可选)
匹配实体的CEM动画变量值
默认为false
示例: (动画变量'varb.xyz') varb.1.xyz=true
§avarb.<n>.<变量>=<true|false>

items.en:
Global Variable Float (Optional)
matches the CEM animation global variable value
defaults to 0
Example: (for animation variable 'global_var.xyz') global_var.1.xyz= 2 4 6
§aglobal_var.<n>.<variable>=<list>
items.zh:
全局浮点变量(可选)
匹配CEM动画全局变量值
默认为0
示例: (动画变量'global_var.xyz') global_var.1.xyz= 2 4 6
§aglobal_var.<n>.<变量>=<列表>

items.en:
Global Variable Boolean (Optional)
matches the CEM animation global variable value
defaults to false
Example: (for animation variable 'global_varb.xyz') global_varb.1.xyz=true
§aglobal_varb.<n>.<variable>=<true|false>
items.zh:
全局布尔变量(可选)
匹配CEM动画全局变量值
默认为false
示例: (动画变量'global_varb.xyz') global_varb.1.xyz=true
§aglobal_varb.<n>.<变量>=<true|false>

items.en:
Global variables are specified in the format "global_var.<name>" (float) or "global_varb.<name>" (boolean) 
The name can be any string, for example "global_var.xyz", "global_var.last_rx", etc.
The variable is globally saved and has a default value 0 or false.
Global variables are useful for storing animation data used by multiple entities.
items.zh:
全局变量格式为"global_var.<名称>"(浮点)或"global_varb.<名称>"(布尔)
名称可为任意字符串，如"global_var.xyz"、"global_var.last_rx"等
变量全局保存，默认值0或false
用于存储多个实体共用的动画数据
禁用第一人称手部动画
每次渲染重置玩家模型

items.en:
This makes EMF reset all the vanilla part transforms of player models well before every render.
Only applies if custom models are present for the player.
This is not the typical behaviour however with how many mods alter player animations
this setting vastly reduces the difficulty of player animation compatibility between mods and animation packs.
E.G. player emote mods.
This compatibility still requires work on the pack makers end.
items.zh:
当玩家存在自定义模型时，EMF将在每次渲染前重置所有原版部件变换
非典型行为，但由于许多模组会修改玩家动画
此设置可大幅降低模组与动画包间的玩家动画兼容性问题
(如玩家表情模组)
仍需动画包制作者进行适配工作

items.en: If enabled this will forcibly prevent all custom EMF animations from playing on the first person hand model
items.zh: 启用后将强制阻止所有EMF自定义动画在第一人称手部模型上播放

items.en: These are all the models modifiable via EMF\nThese screens will only show / export information about these models unmodified state\nIf you want to see the current state of a model you will have to look at the model in game
items.zh: 这些是EMF可修改的所有模型\n此处仅显示/导出这些模型的原始状态信息\n如需查看模型当前状态需在游戏中观察

items.en: Some EBE mod options have been forcibly disabled by EMF
items.zh: 部分EBE模组选项已被EMF强制禁用

items.en: This happens because a resource-pack is loading a custom model for that block entity
items.zh: 因资源包正在加载该方块实体的自定义模型

items.en: This can be changed in EMF's model settings

It is a best practise with OptiFine to require a 'base' model for variation, as this can be very inconsistent with OptiFine. With the setting enabled this will mean 'pig2.jem' will not variate without a 'pig.jem'.
EMF does not require this, but will enforce it if enabled here as it is best to preserve OptiFine compatibility where possible.
You can easily get a default model by exporting it in the EMF settings via 'models > allmodels > *model* > export'.
Or just disable this setting.
items.zh:
OptiFine最佳实践要求变体需有'基础'模型(如'pig2.jem'需有'pig.jem'才能作为变体)
EMF虽不强制要求，但启用此选项可保持OptiFine兼容性
可通过EMF设置的'models > allmodels > *model* > export'导出默认模型
或直接禁用此选项

items.en: Fix double chest model log errors
items.zh: 修复双箱模型日志错误

items.en:
Because the double chest model, 'chest_large.jem', has to be split into 2 half models in the code
there can be excessive log spam about the missing left/right half.
This option fixes that if enabled and also somewhat fixes animations referring to the opposite side of the chest.
You are still highly recommended to keep the left and right half animations separate.
This is an option because other mods affecting chest models may potentially have an issue with this.
items.zh:
由于大型箱子模型'chest_large.jem'在代码中需拆分为两个半模型
可能导致关于缺失左/右半部的过量日志输出
启用此选项可修复该问题，并部分修复引用箱子另一侧的动画
仍建议将左右半部动画分开处理
因其他修改箱子模型的模组可能存在兼容问题，故设为可选

items.en:
This will make it so the entity model doesn't animate twice
each frame for both the render and the iris shadow pass
this should always be ON and is only here in case of
future breaking iris api changes
items.zh: 避免实体模型每帧为渲染和Iris阴影通道重复动画两次\n通常应保持启用，仅当未来Iris API变更导致问题时可供关闭

items.en: Sets where the ETF settings button will appear in the resource pack menu.\nor disable it entirely.
items.zh: 设置在资源包菜单中ETF设置按钮出现的位置。\n或完全禁用它。

items.en: Opens the Entity Features config screen.
items.zh: 打开实体特性配置界面。

items.en: No settings available\nThe Entity Model Features mod is needed if you want OptiFine format Custom Entity Models.
items.zh: 无可用设置\n如需OptiFine格式的自定义实体模型，需要安装实体模型特性模组。

items.en: No settings available\nThe Entity Sound Features mod is needed if you want Varied Entity Sounds.
items.zh: 无可用设置\n如需多样化实体音效，需要安装实体音效特性模组。

items.en: This setting will prevent ETF from loading overrides for the 'base' texture if present in the optifine/etf directories\nE.G. optifine/random/entity/chicken.png will not act as an override to the vanilla texture.\nON is the default OptiFine behaviour.
items.zh: 此设置将阻止ETF加载'基础'纹理的覆盖（如果存在于optifine/etf目录中）\n例如：optifine/random/entity/chicken.png将不会覆盖原版纹理。\n开启是OptiFine的默认行为。

items.en: These options are for backwards compatibility with OptiFine.\nSome will put limitations on certain features because OptiFine does.\nSome will enable some odd behaviours because OptiFine does.
items.zh: 这些选项用于保持与OptiFine的向后兼容性。\n部分选项会因OptiFine的限制而禁用某些功能。\n部分选项会启用某些异常行为以匹配OptiFine。

items.en: OptiFine limits random .properties file rule numbers such that in\nsequential order the rule numbers do not exceed a gap of 9.\nThis setting enforces this limit in ETF if enabled, for OptiFine compatibility.
items.zh: OptiFine限制随机.properties文件规则编号的间隔，\n要求连续规则编号之间的差值不超过9。\n此设置将强制ETF遵守此限制以确保OptiFine兼容性。
允许随机后缀编号跳过

items.en: OptiFine allows random suffix variants, when not using .properties, to skip some numbers\nDoing so is considered a bad practise, they should always be sequential.\nThis setting will allow ETF to skip numbers like OptiFine.
items.zh: OptiFine允许不使用.properties文件时，随机后缀变体可以跳过某些编号\n这种做法被认为是不规范的，编号应该始终保持连续。\n此设置将允许ETF像OptiFine一样跳过编号。
这些方块实体渲染器可能
不会实际使用这些功能

items.en: Enables ETF to try and override the render layer of an entity.\nAllowing transparency for example.\nThis will not always work properly...
items.zh: 允许ETF尝试覆盖实体的渲染层。\n例如实现透明效果。\n这可能无法始终正常工作...

items.en: Enables ETF to try and override the default light level of an entity. E.G. you can stop Blazes & Allays from being bright by setting this to 0.
items.zh: 允许ETF尝试覆盖实体的默认光照等级。例如：通过设为0可以阻止烈焰人和Allay发光。

items.en:
Whether or not to allow or deny property
restrictions on a mob with a property that
is restricted to its spawn conditions
e.g. biomes
items.zh: 是否允许或禁止对生物应用\n受其生成条件限制的属性\n例如生物群系限制

items.en:
This setting allows you to overwrite the
Vanilla behaviour of prohibiting all
non [a-z0-9/._-] characters in texture paths.
This means textures with spaces or capitals
are allowed to be used.
Disabled by default as these problems should really
be fixed by the resource pack creator
items.zh:
此设置允许覆盖原版禁止在纹理路径中使用
非[a-z0-9/._-]字符的行为。
这意味着允许使用包含空格或大写字母的纹理路径。
默认禁用，因为这些问题应该由
资源包创建者自行修复
允许限制未知纹理属性

items.en: Sets whether or not to allow spawn condition restrictions\nFor all additional ETF, EMF, or other mod added properties
items.zh: 设置是否允许对所有额外ETF、EMF\n或其他模组添加的属性应用生成条件限制

items.en:
Most resource packs use the emissive suffix _e
however this can be overridden by packs if they
want to use a different suffix.
If this is true the mod will always check for
'_e' suffixes even when set differently by a resource pack
items.zh:
大多数资源包使用_e作为发光纹理后缀
但资源包可以通过设置覆盖此行为
如果启用，模组将始终检查'_e'后缀
即使资源包设置了不同的后缀

items.en:
when enabled ETF will not tamper with any
texture that has an animation
currently only if MoreMcmeta mod is present.

Note: this may introduce z-fighting depending on your shader
items.zh:
启用时ETF不会干预任何
带有动画的纹理
当前仅在安装MoreMcmeta模组时生效

注意：根据着色器不同可能导致深度冲突

items.en: ETF's armor code is know to cause some issues with modded armor and it uses the old ETF system\n this setting exists to allow you to disable emissive armor and trims if you have an incompatibility\n until I am able to reimplement ETF into armor a better way
items.zh: ETF的盔甲代码已知与某些模组盔甲存在兼容性问题\n此设置允许在出现不兼容时禁用发光盔甲功能\n直到我能用更好的方式重新实现ETF盔甲系统

items.en:
Sets how often textures will randomly blink
If set to 100 mobs will blink randomly after
1 second delay and then at a random time from
1 to 100 ticks (0-5 seconds).
This can be set / overridden per mob
by the resource pack.
See the mod download page for details.
items.zh:
设置纹理随机眨眼的频率
设为100时生物会在1秒延迟后
以1-100刻(0-5秒)的随机间隔眨眼
资源包可为每个生物单独设置此值
详见模组下载页面说明

items.en:
Sets how long textures will blink for
0 = 1 tick, 19 = 20 ticks / 1 second
This can be set / overridden per mob
by the resource pack.
See the mod download page for details.
items.zh:
设置眨眼持续的时长
0=1刻，19=20刻/1秒
资源包可为每个生物单独设置此值
详见模组下载页面说明

items.en:
Sets whether or not mobs will try to blink
The Mob must have a texture with it's eyes
closed named "textureName_blink.png".
And an optional texture with it's eyes half
closed named 'textureName_blink2.png'.
items.zh: 设置生物是否会尝试眨眼\n需要准备名为\"纹理名_blink.png\"的闭眼纹理\n以及可选的\"纹理名_blink2.png\"半闭眼纹理

items.en: Allows block entities to use a custom textures\nusing the OptiFine/ETF random format.\nIncompatible with the Enhanced Block Entities mod.
items.zh: 允许方块实体使用OptiFine/ETF格式的随机纹理\n与Enhanced Block Entities模组不兼容

items.en: If enabled, this will write relevant ETF data\nabout any entity that has been right clicked\nto either the log file or the in-game chat
items.zh: 启用后会将右键点击实体的相关ETF数据\n写入日志文件或游戏聊天栏

items.en: Send ALL! ETF data to the log
Send ALL! ETF data to the log
items.zh: 已导出全部ETF数据到日志

items.en: This setting will print out all of ETF's current texture data to the log.\n including all textures, all texture variation groups\n anything registered to ETF
items.zh: 此设置会将ETF当前所有纹理数据输出到日志\n包括所有纹理、纹理变体组\n以及所有已注册到ETF的内容

items.en: By default you can use the vanilla directory for random textures\nThis will allow you to disable that and enforce the optifine and etf folders usage\nThis is intended to support mods that have entity textures named 'mob2.png' for some reason
items.zh: 默认可以使用原版目录存放随机纹理\n此设置将强制要求使用optifine和etf文件夹\n用于支持某些将实体纹理命名为'mob2.png'的模组

items.en:
The thickness of elytra is a bit larger than
the 2 pixels it is meant to be.
This option will 'fix' the scaling of the elytra to
be more consistent.
Requires a resource reload (F3 + T)
items.zh: 修复鞘翅厚度大于设计值2像素的问题\n使鞘翅比例更加准确\n需要重载资源包(F3+T)

items.en: Allows block entities to use emissive textures\nIncompatible with the Enhanced Block Entities mod
items.zh: 允许方块实体使用发光纹理\n与Enhanced Block Entities模组不兼容

items.en:
This sets whether emissives use 'Brighter' or 'Default' rendering
This is hard to describe, just try it out in-game :)
Bright rendering makes the emissive appear at max brightness if need be
and is only partially compatible with shaders, etc.
Default rendering respects the default renderers effects on entities,
the direction of each surface will have slight brightness variation
and the emissives will be a bit less bright overall
as well as usually smaller bloom with shaders.
items.zh:
设置发光效果使用'更亮'或'默认'渲染
难以文字描述，建议在游戏中体验:)
更亮模式会使发光部分达到最大亮度
对着色器的兼容性有限
默认模式会遵循实体渲染器的效果
不同表面方向会有细微亮度变化
整体发光亮度稍低
着色器产生的光晕效果通常也更小

items.en:
Enables randomized entity textures
Works with resource packs.
Allows for entity texture customization
using the OptiFine format
items.zh:
启用随机化实体纹理
与资源包兼容
允许使用OptiFine格式
自定义实体纹理

items.en:
Allows elytras to use emissive textures
Elytras only have emissive support as the CIT mod
already handles customizing these and is fully
compatible with ETF's emissive textures.
items.zh: 允许鞘翅使用发光纹理\n鞘翅发光功能已由CIT模组完整支持\n与ETF发光纹理完全兼容

items.en: Enables emissive entity textures\nWorks with resource packs\nusing the OptiFine format
items.zh: 启用发光实体纹理\n与资源包兼容\n使用OptiFine格式

允许在PvP游戏中为敌对队伍玩家
启用/禁用皮肤特性
否则可能难以辨认并影响平衡
///此设置需要重启游戏生效\\\

items.en:
Allows tridents to use custom & emissive textures
This toggle is here to support possible future CIT mod updates
The trident item name will choose the texture file to use
The texture 'trident_bobbys_trident.png' will be chosen by the names:
'Bobby's Trident', ' BoBb%Ys   Trid##en t' & 'bobbys_trident'.
The texture 'trident_bobbys_trident_e.png' will be emissive.
items.zh:
允许三叉戟使用自定义&发光纹理
此选项为未来CIT模组更新预留支持
三叉戟物品名称决定使用哪个纹理文件
名称包含'Bobby's Trident'、'BoBb%Ys Trid##en t'
或'bobbys_trident'时会使用'trident_bobbys_trident.png'
纹理'trident_bobbys_trident_e.png'将作为发光纹理

items.en: Enables enchanted entity texture overlays\nJust like emissive textures but uses the \"_enchant\" suffix
items.zh: 启用附魔实体纹理覆盖层\n类似发光纹理但使用\"_enchant\"后缀

items.en: If this warning / conflict\nis ignored it will no longer\naffect ETF settings
items.zh: 如果忽略此警告/冲突\n将不再影响ETF设置

items.en:
This option only appears if a warning is displayed or it is enabled
If enabled, ETF will ignore and hide warnings and will no longer disable
features automatically for compatibility reasons
The amount of warnings currently being ignored is
items.zh:
仅当出现警告或已启用时显示此选项
启用后ETF将忽略并隐藏警告
且不再因兼容性问题自动禁用功能
当前已忽略的警告数量：

items.en: ETF has detected a resource pack with a non [a-z0-9_.-] character in the file path.\nThis texture will be ignored by ETF unless you enable the [Allow broken texture paths] option in ETFs settings.\nThe Vanilla error message for the incorrect texture will now follow:
items.zh:
ETF检测到资源包中存在包含非[a-z0-9_.-]字符的文件路径
除非在ETF设置中启用[允许非法纹理路径]选项
否则该纹理将被ETF忽略
原版关于错误纹理的提示信息如下：

items.en: ETF has allowed a resource with a non [a-z0-9_.-] character in the file path, it is recommended you fix this file name.
items.zh: ETF已允许包含非[a-z0-9_.-]字符的文件路径资源，建议修复此文件名

items.en: Logs details about a texture when it is first initialized.\nE.G. what variants are found if any, what has emissives, etc
items.zh: 记录纹理首次初始化的详细信息\n例如发现的变体、发光部分等

items.en:
when enabled ETF will not tamper with any
texture that has PBR textures with them
if shader mods are present.

Note: this may introduce z-fighting depending on your shader
items.zh:
启用时ETF不会干预任何
带有PBR纹理的材质
需安装着色器模组
注意：根据着色器不同可能导致深度冲突

items.en: What position on the head should blinking occur\n 1 = top of head\n8 = bottom of head
items.zh: 设置头部眨眼发生的位置\n1=头顶\n8=下巴

items.en: Blinking has been enabled and slowed down
items.zh: 已启用眨眼功能并降低频率

items.en:
Select what kind of blinking your skin needs
for eyes of varying sizes.

Blinking must be enabled in settings!
items.zh: 根据眼睛大小选择眨眼类型\n\n需在设置中启用眨眼功能！

items.en: An interactive tool to select and add
items.zh: 交互式工具，用于选择和添加

items.en: player skin features to your skin
items.zh: 皮肤特性到您的玩家皮肤

items.en: Hover mouse over button for help.
items.zh: 鼠标悬停按钮查看帮助

items.en:
Lets you select between using various capes:
OptiFine cape
minecraftcapes.net cape 
The ETF cape
or texture your own custom cape in your skin
items.zh:
选择使用哪种披风：
OptiFine披风
minecraftcapes.net披风
ETF披风
或在皮肤中自定义披风纹理

items.en: Choose how long the extension is\nfrom 1 - 8

items.zh: 外套延伸：复制 | 细边 | 保留顶部
外套延伸：移动 | 细边 | 保留顶部
外套延伸：复制 | 宽边 | 保留顶部
外套延伸：移动 | 宽边 | 保留顶部

items.en: Jacket Extension: copy | thin | no top
items.zh: 外套延伸：复制 | 细边 | 无顶部

items.en: Jacket Extension: move | thin | no top
items.zh: 外套延伸：移动 | 细边 | 无顶部

items.en: Jacket Extension: copy | wide | no top
items.zh: 外套延伸：复制 | 宽边 | 无顶部

items.en: Jacket Extension: move | wide | no top
items.zh: 外套延伸：移动 | 宽边 | 无顶部

items.en:
This feature provides extension options
on how Minecraft renders the
'Jacket' layer of your skin
(the second layer that floats above your body)
and allows it to go up to 8 pixels further down.
Typical uses could be for jackets,
dresses, villager cloaks and robes.
The texturing is extremely straight forward,
if enabled this feature will
 copy or move the contents of the top of
the legs floating skin layers and
 use them to build the extension.
items.zh:
此特性提供延伸选项
控制Minecraft如何渲染
皮肤的'外套'层(第二层)
允许向下延伸最多8像素
典型用途包括夹克、连衣裙
村民斗篷和长袍
纹理处理非常简单
启用后会复制或移动
腿部上方浮动层的内容
用于构建延伸部分

items.en: You can crouch before opening the menu to see it here
items.zh: 打开菜单前可先蹲下查看效果

items.en: Allows selecting pixels in your skin to be emissive
items.zh: 允许选择皮肤中的发光像素

items.en: Allows selecting pixels in your skin to be enchanted
items.zh: 允许选择皮肤中的附魔像素

items.en: Settings will not update for the skin tool until this config has been saved
items.zh: 皮肤工具的设置需保存配置后才会更新

items.en:
Select a nose type for your skin
Villager #1 uses the villager texture
Villager #2 uses your skin for the texture
 (positioned like in the villager texture)
The textured options are flat noses using
 various different locations in the skin
items.zh:
选择皮肤鼻子类型
村民#1使用村民纹理
村民#2使用皮肤纹理
（位置与村民纹理相同）
纹理选项使用皮肤中
不同位置的平面鼻子

村民纹理型（移除面部像素）

items.en: Skin file failed to save to file.\nCheck you latest.log for errors.
items.zh: 皮肤文件保存失败\n请检查latest.log中的错误

items.en: Skin file has been saved successfully.
The skin tool could not be enabled because: \n
items.zh: 皮肤工具无法启用的原因：\n

items.en: -ETF skin features are not enabled.\n You must enable them, then close and reopen the settings to apply it.\n
items.zh: -ETF皮肤特性未启用\n需先启用后关闭并重新打开设置\n

items.en: -Fabric API was not found.\n It is required for the skin tool to work on Fabric.\n
items.zh: -未找到Fabric API\nFabric环境下需要此组件\n

items.en:
-The client player data was null.
 Make sure you have a world open and
 your skin has loaded before you try to use the tool.
items.zh:
-客户端玩家数据为空
请确保已打开世界且
皮肤加载完成后再使用工具

items.zh: -ETF尚未解析客户端玩家皮肤\n请先打开世界并进入第三人称\n或打开物品栏查看自己几秒钟

items.en: Allows this skin to use ETF transparent skin features\notherwise forces the inner-skin to be opaque like vanilla
items.zh: 允许此皮肤使用ETF透明皮肤特性\n否则会强制内层皮肤不透明（如原版）

items.en: Upload skin changes to Minecraft profile
items.zh: 上传皮肤更改至Minecraft个人资料

items.en: Skin uploaded successfully, but could not be updated in-game without restart
items.zh: 皮肤上传成功，但需重启游戏才能更新

items.en:
Allows player skins to use the features added by this mod.
Features are set in the players skin file.
 - Use the skin tool to select features
 - Documentation can be found on the mod page
 - This can be disabled for enemy team players for PvP
Features include:
 - Emissive pixels
 - Enchanted pixels
 - Blinking & closed eyes when sleeping
 - maybe more...
items.zh:
允许玩家皮肤使用本模组添加的特性
特性需在皮肤文件中设置
- 使用皮肤工具选择特性
- 文档详见模组页面
- PvP中可为敌对队伍禁用
特性包括：
- 发光像素
- 附魔像素
- 眨眼&睡眠时闭眼
- 可能更多...

items.en:
ETF removes pixels underneath
 emissive textures to prevent Z-fighting
with shaders.
 
Disabling these settings may:

- Cause Z-fighting emissives with
some shaders.

- Fix Iris PBR textures not working
for mobs with emissive textures.

- Fix animated textures having missing
pixels with animation mods.

- Break armour legging emissives when
 a chestplate is equipped.
items.zh:
ETF会移除发光纹理下的像素
防止与着色器产生深度冲突

禁用这些设置可能导致：

- 某些着色器的发光部分深度冲突

- 修复Iris PBR纹理
在发光生物上失效的问题

- 修复动画模组导致的
纹理像素缺失

- 穿戴胸甲时
护腿发光部分异常

items.en: Enables the property to be used\ndisabled ones will be ignored in resource packs
items.zh: 启用该属性供资源包使用\n禁用的属性将被忽略

items.en:
Sets whether this property is locked to the
spawn conditions of the entity
If locked, the property will only apply to the entities initial spawn conditions
If not locked, the property will apply to the entities current conditions
items.zh:
设置该属性是否
与实体生成条件绑定
锁定后仅适用于初始生成条件
未锁定则适用当前条件

items.en: Save a copy of your skin with the skin feature template applied
items.zh: 保存带特性模板的皮肤副本

items.en:
To help you setup your skin for skin features
This setting will save a copy of your skin with
the skin feature template applied onto it
to the minecraft directory.
After enabling this setting open a game, enter third person & press F3+T.
You will get a message in chat telling you when it is finished.
items.zh:
帮助设置皮肤特性
此设置会保存带特性模板的
皮肤副本到.minecraft目录
启用后进入游戏，切换第三人称并按F3+T
聊天栏将显示完成通知

items.en:
Allows player skins to be 100% transparent
WARNING: this overrides the 60% transparency check
 for player skins so they can be completely invisible
 this option only changes what you can see and will
 not make you invisible to others, it is meant for fun.
//REQUIRES RESTART\\
items.zh:
允许皮肤完全透明
警告：这将覆盖60%透明度限制
使皮肤完全隐形（仅视觉效果）
他人仍可见，仅为娱乐用途
//需重启生效\

items.en:
Allows player skins to be transparent on the base texture
the texture can only be an average of
 60% transparent to prevent abuse
- uses transparency in the skin texture itself
items.zh:
允许基础纹理透明
平均透明度不超过60%
以防滥用
- 直接使用皮肤纹理中的透明度

items.en: this will attempt to enabled transparent skin rendering\n for ALL skins not just ETF enabled skins\n WARNING this bypasses the 100% transparency check
items.zh: 尝试为所有皮肤（不仅是ETF皮肤）\n启用透明渲染\n警告：这将绕过100%透明度检查

items.en:
You are seeing this as the 3D skin layers mod is detected.
ETF contains a patch to allow skin features to
render correctly with the excellent 3d Skin Layers mod
future changes to that mod might break this so the patch is optional

RESTART REQUIRED after changing this
items.zh:
检测到3D皮肤层模组
ETF包含补丁以确保与该优秀模组兼容
未来更新可能导致失效，故补丁可选

更改后需重启游戏

items.en: Click a pixel in your skin to select those colours
items.zh: 点击皮肤像素选择对应颜色

items.en: WARNING: you have selected too many different colours, some may not work
items.zh: 警告：选择颜色过多可能导致部分失效

items.en: This option is provided as these cases\nmay not fit into the typical users expectation of entity.
items.zh: 这些特殊情况可能\n不符合用户对实体的常规预期

items.en:
Sets how often a mobs textures will
update for changes like health & age
Never = never update
Slow = 3-5 seconds
Fast = less than a second
Instant = instant (possible lag with hundred of mobs)
items.zh:
设置生物纹理更新频率
（如生命值、年龄变化时）
从不=永不更新
慢速=3-5秒
快速=1秒内
即时=立即更新（大量生物可能卡顿）

items.en: Allow warden glowing textures for full model
items.zh: 允许监守者全身发光纹理

items.en:
The vanilla game only allows the wardens glowing textures like
 'warden_heart.png'
to render for the one body part it applies too
 enabling this setting will let that texture apply to the entire model
items.zh: 原版仅允许'warden_heart.png'等\n发光纹理应用于特定部位\n启用后该纹理将适用于整个模型

items.en: ETF block entity features don't apply to EBE block entities.
items.zh: ETF方块实体特性不适用于EBE方块实体

items.zh: 为兼容性已禁用ETF皮肤特性

items.zh: 如需OptiFine格式的自定义实体模型需要安装实体模型特性(EMF)模组

items.en: Quark's [Variant Animal Textures] must be disabled for ETF random textures to work.
items.zh: 必须禁用Quark的[动物纹理变体]功能才能使ETF随机纹理生效

items.en: The ETF config file was either corrupt or could not be loaded! Default settings are being used...
items.zh: ETF配置文件损坏或无法加载！正在使用默认设置...

items.en: Some warnings disable the conflicting ETF settings, unless ignored
items.zh: 部分警告会自动禁用冲突的ETF设置（除非手动忽略）

items.en: ETF tried to apply an example texture overlay that would overwrite pixels in your skin.
items.zh: ETF尝试应用示例纹理覆盖层（将覆盖皮肤原有像素）

items.zh: 点击后将阻止ETF添加任何示例纹理覆盖层\n例如眼睛或鼻子位置的示例像素

items.en: Sets how ETF should enable transparent skins\nBy default this is only enabled for skins using ETF skin features
items.zh: 设置ETF启用透明皮肤的方式\n默认仅对使用ETF特性的皮肤生效

items.en: Hardcore\nIf the world is hardcore mode or not\n§ahardcore.<n>=<true/false>

List of biomes
The vanilla biome names are listed here: https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Biome#Biome_IDs
Biomes added by mods can also be used but require "modID:biomeName", whereas vanilla biomes can be either "minecraft:plains" or just "plains".
With ETF only, you can also use regex: iregex: pattern: and ipattern: like the Name property
§abiomes.<n>=<biome_list>
items.zh:
生物群系列表
原版群系名称参见：https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Biome#Biome_IDs
模组群系需使用"模组ID:群系名称"格式
ETF额外支持正则表达式：iregex: pattern: 和 ipattern:
§abiomes.<n>=<群系列表>

items.en: List of game modes of the client player\nIn vanilla these are: 0=survival, 1=creative, 2=adventure, 3=spectator\n§aclientGameMode.<n>=<list>

List of regional difficulties
 ranges between 0.0 to 6.75 different per chunk
 see https://minecraft.wiki/w/Difficulty#Regional_difficulty
§aregionalDifficulty.<n>=<list>

Blocks
sets the texture for the entity based on the block it is on
this also checks the block it is inside allowing things like water, cave_air, flowers, etc. to be used
Blocks added by mods can also be used but require "modID:blockName", whereas vanilla blocks can be either "minecraft:stone" or just "stone".
as of v4.4 this property also allows comparing additional block properties as per the OptiFine spec here https://optifine.readthedocs.io/syntax.html#blocks-and-items
§ablocks.<n>=<block_list>
items.zh:
方块
根据实体所在方块设置纹理
会检测实体内部方块（如水、洞穴空气、花等）
模组方块需使用“模组ID:方块名称”格式
v4.4起支持比较额外方块属性
§ablocks.<n>=<方块列表>

items.en:
Blocks spawned
sets the texture for the entity based on the block it spawned on or first appeared on
this also checks the block it spawned inside allowing things like water, cave_air, flowers, etc. to be used
Blocks added by mods can also be used but require "modID:blockName", whereas vanilla blocks can be either "minecraft:stone" or just "stone".
as of v4.4 this property also allows comparing additional block properties as per the OptiFine spec here https://optifine.readthedocs.io/syntax.html#blocks-and-items
§ablockSpawned.<n>=<block_list>
items.zh:
生成方块
根据实体生成时所在方块设置纹理
会检测生成时内部方块
模组方块需使用“模组ID:方块名称”格式
v4.4起支持比较额外方块属性
§ablockSpawned.<n>=<方块列表>

items.en:
Height ranges
Replaces legacy minHeight and maxHeight properties.
Since 1.18 negative values may be specified for height. When used in a range they can be put in brackets for Optifine but will function as written for ETF.
ETF supports:             1 2-4   -65-2  -65--2   1-4   (-65)-2  (-65)-(-2)
Optifine supports only:   1 2-4                   1-4   (-65)-2  (-65)-(-2)
§aheights.<n>=<height_ranges>

Height legacy
ETF also supports the legacy minHeight and maxHeight properties.
they can be a single number from -64 to 319
§aminHeight.<n>=<height>
§amaxHeight.<n>=<height>
items.zh:
高度范围
取代旧版minHeight/maxHeight属性
1.18起支持负值，ETF支持格式：
1 2-4 -65-2 -65--2 1-4 (-65)-2 (-65)-(-2)
§aheights.<n>=<高度范围>

旧版高度
仍支持minHeight/maxHeight单数值格式
§aminHeight.<n>=<高度>
§amaxHeight.<n>=<高度>

items.en:
Name
Matches to an entities name.
A value starting with "!" performs a negative match (not).
Examples:
 - Match string: "name=Pinky pinkyyy"
 - Match special formatting: "name=\§4\§oPinky"
   (for best compatibility, use the escape sequence '\§' instead of "§")
 - Wildcards using "?" and "*": "name=pattern:Pinky*"
 - Wildcards, case insensitive: "name=ipattern:Pinky*"
 - Java regular expressions: "name=regex:Pin(k)+y"
   (see http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/util/regex/Pattern.html)
 - Java regular expressions, case insensitive: "name=iregex:Pin(k)+y"
Any backslashes in the match string must be doubled.
Literal backslashes within a regular expression or wildcard must be quadrupled.
Correct:
  name=regex:\\d+
  name=regex:\\\\
  name=/\\/\\
Wrong:
  name=regex:\d+
  name=regex:\\
  name=/\/\
§anames.<n>=<name_list|regex|pattern>
items.zh:
名称
匹配实体名称
“!”开头表示反向匹配
支持通配符(?和*)、正则表达式等
§anames.<n>=<名称列表|正则表达式>

items.en:
Teams
ETF only!
This is identical to the Names property behaviour however allows definition by way of scoreboard teams
supports grouping names between "" quotations.
you can also use regex: iregex: pattern: and ipattern: like the Name property
Example:
 - teams.1=Red red red_team "red team"
§ateams.<n>=<teams>
items.zh:
队伍
ETF专属！
功能同名称属性但基于记分板队伍
支持“”引号分组和正则表达式
§ateams.<n>=<队伍列表>

items.en:
Professions 
List of villager professions with levels
Entry format
  <profession>[:level1,level2,...]
Professions: none, armorer, butcher, cartographer, cleric, farmer, fisherman, fletcher,
             leatherworker, librarian, mason, nitwit, shepherd, toolsmith, weaponsmith
Example:
Professions farmer (all levels) or librarian (levels 1,3,4)
  professions=farmer librarian:1,3-4
  professions=minecraft:farmer minecraft:librarian:1,3-4
Professions full
  professions=fisherman shepherd minecraft:nitwit villager_mod:town_mayor
  professions=minecraft:fisherman minecraft:shepherd minecraft:nitwit
§aprofessions.<n>=<professions>
items.zh:
职业
村民职业及等级列表
格式：<职业>[:等级1,等级2...]
§aprofessions.<n>=<职业列表>

items.en:
Colors 
List of wolf/cat collar colors or sheep/llama colors
ETF also supports shulker colors & tropical fish colours (but only for the base fish texture)
Colors: white orange magenta light_blue yellow lime pink gray light_gray cyan purple blue brown green red black
Example:
  colors.2=pink magenta purple
The legacy property "collarColors" is also recognized
§acolors.<n>=<colors>
items.zh:
颜色
狼/猫项圈或羊/羊驼颜色
ETF额外支持潜影贝和热带鱼颜色
§acolors.<n>=<颜色列表>

items.en:
Health 
Range of health values, can also be given in percent.
Only valid for mobs.
Example:
  health.1=10
  health.2=5-8 10-12
  health.3=0-50%
§ahealth.<n>=<list>
items.zh:
生命值
支持百分比格式
仅限生物
§ahealth.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en:
Moon phase 
List of moon phases (0-7)
Example
  moonPhase.1=3
  moonPhase.2=0 1 2
  moonPhase.1=0-2 4-7
§amoonPhase.<n>=<list>

Day time 
List of day times in ticks (0-24000)
Example
  dayTime.1=2000-10000
  dayTime.2=0-1000 18000-24000
§adayTime.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 昼夜时间\n游戏刻0-24000\n§adayTime.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en:
Weather 
Several values can be specified, separated by space
for example "weather=clear rain thunder"
§aweather.<n>=<clear|rain|thunder>

Sizes 
Only valid for mobs with multiple sizes (0-255 for slimes and magma cubes and 0-64 for phantoms)
Slimes and magma cubes naturally spawn in three sizes: 0=small, 1=medium, 3=big.
Naturally spawning phantoms only spawn in one size: 0.
Example
  sizes.1=3
  sizes.2=0 1 3
  sizes.3=0-2 4-7
§asizes.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 尺寸\n仅限可变尺寸生物\n§asizes.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en:
NBT 
Select whether a mob must have matching NBT data values
Note: this is an OptiFine feature that has not yet received official documentation,
ETF has copied the syntax listed in https://optifine.readthedocs.io/syntax.html#nbt for now.
NBT requires an additional value in the key this is called <nbtPath>.
- nbtPath must match the exact name of the nbt element and is case-sensitive
- nbtPath supports matching nested nbt elements by defining the full nbt path with '.' marking a separation
- E.G. the Villager profession level nbtPath is "VillagerData.level" meaning the full property key would be "nbt.<n>.VillagerData.level"
NBT can be used in several ways see this link https://optifine.readthedocs.io/syntax.html#nbt for details
Additionally ETF adds a variation to the "raw:" syntax called "print_raw:" which will act just like "raw:" but will
also print what that raw value is to the log for testing purposes,
ETF also allows you to start the string with "print:" to always print the full NBT data of the entity
§anbt.<n>.<nbtPath>=<exists:|raw:|print_raw:|print:|range:|regex:|iregex:|pattern:|ipattern:|string_list>
items.zh:
NBT数据
需精确匹配NBT路径
支持嵌套路径(用.分隔)
§anbt.<n>.<nbt路径>=<条件>

items.en:
NBT Vehicle 
Select whether a mob's ridden entity must have matching NBT data values
Works exactly like the NBT property but for the ridden entity, false if it doesn't exist
§anbtVehicle.<n>.<nbtPath>=<exists:|raw:|print_raw:|print:|range:|regex:|iregex:|pattern:|ipattern:|string_list>
items.zh: 骑乘实体NBT\n匹配骑乘实体的NBT数据\n§anbtVehicle.<n>.<nbt路径>=<条件>

items.en:
NBT Client 
Select whether the client player must have matching NBT data values
Works exactly like the NBT property but for the client players nbt
§anbtClient.<n>.<nbtPath>=<exists:|raw:|print_raw:|print:|range:|regex:|iregex:|pattern:|ipattern:|string_list>
items.zh: 客户端玩家NBT\n匹配客户端玩家NBT数据\n§anbtClient.<n>.<nbt路径>=<条件>

items.en:
Speed Ranges 
ETF Only!
Select a range of top speeds a mob must match
Functional for all mobs but intended for Horses, Donkeys & Mules
Horse, Donkey & Mule speeds exist within a range of: 0.1125 - 0.3375
The "-" and two numbers either side are necessary
§aspeed.<n>=minimum_speed - maximum_speed
items.zh:
移动速度
ETF专属！
匹配生物最高移动速度范围
§aspeed.<n>=最小速度-最大速度

items.en:
Jump Strength 
ETF Only!
Select a range of Jump Strength a mob must match
Functional for Horses, Donkeys & Mules
Horse, Donkey & Mule jump strengths exist within a range of: 0.4 - 1.0
The "-" and two numbers either side are necessary
§ajumpStrength.<n>=minimum_strength - maximum_strength
items.zh:
跳跃强度
ETF专属！
匹配马匹跳跃强度范围
§ajumpStrength.<n>=最小强度-最大强度

items.en:
Max Health 
ETF Only!
Select Max Health values a mob must match
Functional for all mobs but intended for Horses, Donkeys & Mules
Horse, Donkey & Mule max health exist within a range of: 15 - 30
Example: maxHealth.1= 3 5 15-20 25 27-29
§amaxHealth.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 最大生命\nETF专属！\n§amaxHealth.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en:
Llama Inventory Slots 
ETF Only!
Select Inventory size values a llama must match
Functional for Llamas only
Llama inventory sizes exist within a range of: 1 - 5
Example: llamaInventory.1= 1 4-5
§allamaInventory.<n>=<list>

Panda Hidden Gene 
ETF Only!
Select what hidden gene a panda must have
§ahiddenGene.<n>=<normal|lazy|worried|playful|brown|weak|aggressive>
items.zh: 熊猫隐藏基因\nETF专属！\n§ahiddenGene.<n>=<基因类型>

items.en:
Player Created Golem 
ETF Only!
Select whether an Iron Golem must be player created or naturally spawned
true = player made, false = naturally spawned
§aplayerCreated.<n>=<true|false>
items.zh:
玩家创造
ETF专属！
铁傀儡是否玩家创造
§aplayerCreated.<n>=<true|false>

items.en:
Screaming Goats 
ETF Only!
Select whether a Goat needs to be the screaming variant or not
true = must be screaming goat, false = must be normal goat
§ascreamingGoat.<n>=<true|false>

Distance from player 
ETF Only!
Select what distance from the Player a mob must match
Values are in blocks, ranges can be used like: 1-5
Example: distanceFromPlayer.1= 3 5 15-20 25 27-50
§adistance.<n>=<list>
items.zh:
玩家距离
ETF专属！
单位：方块
§adistance.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en:
Charged Creeper 
ETF Only!
Select whether a Creeper needs to be charged by lightning or not
true = charged, false = normal
§acreeperCharged.<n>=<true|false>

Angry 
ETF Only!
Select whether a Mob must be in their angered / attacking state or not
works for Endermen, Blazes, Guardians, Vindicators and Evokers
Triggers when these mobs display their client side 'angered or attacking state' (e.g. open mouth for endermen & blazes igniting)
Example: angry.1=true
§aangry.<n>=<true|false>

Items 
Select whether a mob must have certain, or any, items equipped or held
Example: items.1=minecraft:book cool_mod:sunglasses   (matches a mob holding or wearing one of these items)
Example: items.1=any                                  (matches a mob holding or wearing any item)
Example: items.1=wearing                              (matches a mob wearing any item)
Example: items.1=none                                 (matches a mob holding or wearing no items)
§aitems.<n>=<list|none|any|holding|wearing>
items.zh: 物品\n匹配持有/穿戴物品\n§aitems.<n>=<物品列表|none|any|holding|wearing>

items.en:
Moving 
Select whether a mob must be moving or standing still
Note: functionally this only detects horizontal movement as vertical velocity is quite unstable in the code
Example: moving.1=false   (matches only a mob standing still)
§amoving.<n>=<true|false>
items.zh: 移动状态\n仅检测水平移动\n§amoving.<n>=<true|false>

items.en:
Spawner 
ETF Only!
Select whether a mob must be a miniature mob inside a mob spawner block
Example: isSpawner.1=true
§aisSpawner.<n>=<true|false>

Dimension 
ETF Only!
Select which dimension a mob must be in
Can prefix with "print:" to always print the dimension the mob is in to the log
helps to identify modded dimension names
Example: dimension.1=minecraft:overworld
§adimension.<n>=<overworld|the_nether|the_end|<modded_dimension_name>>

Light 
ETF Only!
Select which light level a mob must be in from 0-15
Example: light.1=0-7 9 14
§alight.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 光照等级\n0-15取值\n§alight.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en:
Variant 
ETF Only!
Select which variant a mob must be
This property will work with any vanilla or modded entity that implements the VariantHolder class and
will use the string representation of the type, e.g. "black" for a cat, "oak" for a boat.
This property also works uniquely with these block entities:
- signs (wood)
- bed (color)
- shulkerbox (color)
- Decorated pot (all 4 sherd face types)
- skulls(appending facing direction at the end)
For all other regular & block entities it returns the EntityType or BlockEntityType registry id.
This allows for the separation of different entity types that might use the same model or texture.
Can prefix with "print:" to always print the variant the mob appears as to the log
Example: variant.1=black yellow
§avariant.<n>=<list>

Creative 
ETF Only!
Select whether a player must be in creative mode or not
true = creative mode, false = survival mode
§aisCreative.<n>=<true|false>

Teammate 
ETF Only!
Select whether a mob must be a teammate of the player
true = teammate, false = not a teammate
§aisTeammate.<n>=<true|false>

Client Player 
ETF Only!
Select whether a mob must be the client player
true = client player, false = not the client player
§aisClientPlayer.<n>=<true|false>

Language 
Select which language the game must be set to
Example: language.1=en_us
§alanguage.<n>=<language_code>

Hour 
Select which hour of the day it must be in 24 hour format from 0 - 23
Example: hour.1=0-6 18-23
§ahour.<n>=<list>

Minute 
Select which minute of the hour it must be from 0 - 59
Example: minute.1=0-30
§aminute.<n>=<list>

Second 
Select which second of the minute it must be from 0 - 59
Example: second.1=0-30
§asecond.<n>=<list>

Month 
Select which month of the year it must be from 0 - 11
Example: month.1=1-6
§amonth.<n>=<list>

Year 
Select which year it must be from 0 - 9999
Example: year.1=2020-2022
§ayear.<n>=<list>

Biome Tag 
Select which Biome Tags the entities spawn biome can have
Example: biomeTag.1=is_river magic_mod:magical_biomes
§abiomeTag.<n>=<list>

Temperature 
Select what temperature it must be at the entities spawn location, this is internally driven by Biome settings as well as world height, for example if the biome has precipitation it will snow if the position is below 0.15 temperature
Example: temperature.1=0.2-0.15
§atemperature.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 温度\n受群系设置和高度影响\n§atemperature.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en:
Minecraft Version 
Select which minecraft version it must be
Example: minecraftVersion.1=1.18.2 1.17 1.20-1.99
§aminecraftVersion.<n>=<list>

Week day 
Select which day of the week it must be from 1 - 7 with 1 being Sunday and 7 being Saturday
Example: weekDay.1=1-4
§aweekDay.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 星期\n1-7取值(1=周日)\n§aweekDay.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en:
Month Day 
Select which day of the month it must be from 1 - 31
Example: monthDay.1=1-15
§amonthDay.<n>=<list>

Year Day 
Select which day of the year it must be from 1 - 366
Example: yearDay.1=1-100
§ayearDay.<n>=<list>

Block Above 
Vary based on the first non-air block above the entity, no matter the distance
Example: blockAbove.1=oak_leaves
§ablockAbove.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 上方方块\n匹配实体上方第一个非空气方块\n§ablockAbove.<n>=<方块列表>

items.en:
Block Above Solid 
Vary based on the first solid non-air block above the entity, no matter the distance, only triggers for the first solid block found.
Example: blockAboveSolid.1=stone
§ablockAboveSolid.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 上方固体方块\n匹配第一个固体方块\n§ablockAboveSolid.<n>=<方块列表>

items.en:
Block Below 
Vary based on the first non-air block below the entity, no matter the distance
Example: blockBelow.1=oak_leaves
§ablockBelow.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 下方方块\n匹配下方第一个非空气方块\n§ablockBelow.<n>=<方块列表>

items.en:
Block Below Solid 
Vary based on the first solid non-air block below the entity, no matter the distance, only triggers for the first solid block found.
Example: blockBelowSolid.1=oak_leaves
§ablockBelowSolid.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 下方固体方块\n匹配第一个固体方块\n§ablockBelowSolid.<n>=<方块列表>

items.en:
Mods Loaded 
Select what mods must be loaded
for instance if you need to disable or modify certain textures or animations for certain mod compatibilites
Example: modLoaded.1=sodium iris
§amodLoaded.<n>=<list>

Texture Rule (Optional)
matches the last random texture rule number that the entities texture matched against
defaults to 0
Example: textureRule.1= 2 4 6
§atextureRule.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 纹理规则(可选)\n匹配最后应用的随机纹理规则编号\n§atextureRule.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en:
Texture Suffix (Optional)
matches the last random texture suffix number that the entities texture was set to
defaults to 0
Example: textureSuffix.1= 2 4 6
§atextureSuffix.<n>=<list>
items.zh: 纹理后缀(可选)\n匹配最后应用的随机纹理后缀编号\n§atextureSuffix.<n>=<数值列表>

items.en: Tweaks the vanilla skin transparency code to make it not affect all the extra pixels that aren't actually used in your skin\nThis allows transparency in these extra pixels without affecting the vanilla skin behaviour\nVery useful for custom player models
items.zh: 调整原版皮肤透明代码，避免影响未使用的像素区域\n允许这些额外像素透明而不改变原版皮肤行为\n对自定义玩家模型非常有用

items.en: (Made for a newer version of Fusion)
This resource pack is made for a newer version of Fusion and may not work correctly with the currently installed version of Fusion.
Do you want to enable the resource pack anyway?
Debugging has been enabled, debug logging will be more verbose!
items.zh: 调试已启用，日志将更加详细！

items.en: Cannot enable client debugging, your computer does not support debug features. Shader debugging has been enabled.
items.zh: 无法启用调试，你的电脑不支持调试功能。

items.en: You do not have a debug context, please restart to enable OpenGL client debugging.
items.zh: 没有调试环境，请重启以启用调试。

items.en: Shader debugging has been enabled; OpenGL debugging is unsupported on NeoForge.
The shaderpack failed to load! Please report the error to the shader developer.
Iris encountered an issue trying to load the shader; please report this to Iris developers.
The shader requested a specific feature (SSBO) that is not supported by your GPU, it may not work correctly.
items.zh: 光影请求了你的 GPU 所不支持的特定功能（SSBO），可能无法正常工作。
重新加载光影包失败！原因：%s

items.en: Iris requires Sodium for good performance, but Sodium is not installed. Please download Sodium, place it in your mods folder, and re-launch the game.
items.zh: Iris 需要 Sodium 来提供更好的性能，但你并没有安装 Sodium。请下载 Sodium，把它放到 mods 文件夹中，并重新启动游戏。

items.en: Iris requires Sodium for good performance, but an incompatible version was found. Please download the correct version of Sodium, place it in your mods folder, remove the incorrect version, and re-launch the game.
items.zh: Iris 需要 Sodium 来提供更好的性能，但不兼容已安装的 Sodium 版本。请下载正确的 Sodium 版本，把它放到 mods 文件夹中，移除错误的 Sodium 版本，并重新启动游戏。

items.en: Not Enough Crashes can severely break the game while handling crashes, and does not provide accurate results.\nA good alternative is MixinTrace, which can identify the cause of a crash more reliably and does not put the game in an invalid state.
items.zh: 在处理崩溃时，Not Enough Crashes 会严重破坏游戏，而且无法提供准确的结果。\n好的替代品有 MixinTrace，它们都可以更准确地识别崩溃原因并且不会使游戏处于无效状态。

items.en: The shaderpack you are trying to load contains features unsupported by %s. Please try another pack. List %s
items.zh: 你尝试加载的光影包含%s不支持的功能。请尝试其他光影。名单：%s

items.en: \nmacOS is known to have issues with many shader packs.
items.zh: \nmacOS 已知与很多光影包都有兼容性问题。

items.en: Files were not valid Shader Packs
items.zh: 文件不是有效的光影包

items.en: \"%s\" is not a valid Shader Pack
\"%s\" is already in your Shader Packs folder!
Cannot import multiple Shader Settings files!
items.zh: 无法导入多个光影设置文件！

items.en: Failed to import Shader Settings file \"%s\"
items.zh: 导入光影设置文件“%s”失败

items.en: Hold SHIFT and click to reset
items.zh: 按住 SHIFT 点击以重置
将应用的设置导出至文件

items.en: Allows you to change the maximum distance for shadows. Terrain and entities beyond this distance will not cast shadows. Lowering the shadow distance can significantly increase performance.
items.zh: 允许更改阴影的最远距离。超出此距离的地形和实体不会投射阴影。降低阴影距离可以显著提高性能。

items.en: Your current shader pack has already set a render distance for shadows; you cannot change it.
items.zh: 你不能改变当前的光影包已经为阴影设置的渲染距离。

items.en: The shadow render distance controls how far away terrain can potentially be rendered in the shadow pass. Lower distances mean that less terrain will be rendered, improving frame rates. This option cannot be changed on packs which explicitly specify a shadow render distance. The actual shadow render distance is capped by the View Distance setting.
items.zh: 阴影渲染距离控制在阴影通道中可以渲染到多远的地形。更短的距离意味着将渲染更少的地形，从而提高帧率。在明确指定了阴影渲染距离的光影包上无法更改此选项。实际阴影渲染的距离受“渲染距离”设置的限制。

items.en: The color space to transform the screen to. Works on top of shader packs. Use SRGB if unsure.
+ Drag and Drop Shader Packs to add
items.zh: + 拖放光影包至此以添加

items.en: Loading JEI, this may take a while
items.zh: 正在加载JEI，这可能会花费一段时间。

items.en: LazyDFU is not installed. If Minecraft needs to update game data from an older version, there may be noticeable lag.
items.zh: 未安装DFU载入优化。如果Minecraft需要从旧版本更新游戏数据，可能会出现极大的延迟。

items.en: FerriteCore is not installed. Memory usage will be very high.
items.zh: 未安装铁氧体磁芯。内存占用将会非常高。

items.en: Connectedness and ModernFix's dynamic resources option are not compatible. Remove Connectedness or disable dynamic resources in the ModernFix config.
items.zh: Connectedness模组（用于提供连接纹理）和现代化修复的动态资源（dynamic resources）功能不兼容。请删除Connectedness模组，或在现代化修复配置中禁用动态资源功能。

items.en: ModernFix mod warnings can be disabled by turning off mixin.feature.warn_missing_perf_mods in the ModernFix config.
items.zh: 推荐安装这些模组，但你也可以在现代化修复的配置中禁用此警告。

items.en: ModernFix detected that Redirector is installed. Redirector is known to cause many strange and hard-to-debug issues, and removing it is strongly recommended.
A mod config file change was detected. To prevent loading files that aren't done saving, reloading must be triggered by running /mfrc.
items.zh: 检测到模组配置文件的更改。为了避免加载尚未保存完毕的文件，重载过程必须通过使用§b/mfrc§r命令来触发。
地图（未能在附近找到相关地物）

items.en: Features that help improve game/launch performance
items.zh: 有助于提升游戏内性能或启动速度的功能

items.en: Core bugfixes to improve game stability
items.zh: 修复重点错误，从而提升游戏稳定性

items.en: Features intended to assist in diagnosing problems
items.zh: 用于辅助诊断问题的功能

items.en: Do not change unless you know what you are doing
items.zh: 不要轻易修改，除非你知道自己究竟在做什么

items.en: 1.16 only. **A key optimization.** Patches JEI to perform its reloading on a background thread, completely eliminating the long delay it adds to world loading.
items.zh: 仅1.16。§l一项关键优化。§r对JEI进行了调整，让其于后台线程上重载，完全消除了它在载入世界时造成的巨大延迟。

items.en: 1.16 only. Backports the Async Locator mod's patches to eliminate server freezes associated with `/locate`, loot table generation, etc.
items.zh: 仅1.16。向后移植了Async Locator模组的补丁，以消除与§b/locate§r、战利品表生成等相关事物的服务端冻结现象。

items.en: 1.16 only. Minor optimization to improve the performance of the biome zoomer using logic from 1.18.
items.zh: 仅1.16。使用1.18版本的逻辑进行微优化，以提高生物群系缩放器（注：用于巨型生物群系）的性能。

items.en: All versions. If REI or JEI are installed, construction of the vanilla search trees for creative searching is disabled, and searching is instead done using these mods' search implementations. This saves several seconds during world loading, and probably also saves some RAM as well (although I have not measured).
items.zh: 全版本共有。原版会构造用于创造模式搜索功能的搜索树，如果安装了REI或者JEI，将禁用原版构造，用这两种模组中的搜索实现取而代之。这在加载世界时会节省几秒钟，并且可能（虽然我没有测试）会减少一点内存占用。

items.en: 1.16 only. Removes the hardcoded cap on worker thread count, similarly to what Mojang did in 1.18.
items.zh: 仅1.16。移除被硬编码的工作线程数量上限，类似于Mojang在1.18中所做的。

items.en: All versions. Avoids creating fresh copies of enum arrays each time a blockstate cache is initialized. Minor optimization, but easy to do.
items.zh: 全版本共有。避免每次初始化方块状态缓存时都创建枚举数组的新副本。只是微优化，但它很容易做到（注：所以顺手做了）。

items.en: All versions. Memoizes the `RenderMaterial` (texture) collection and dependency list that models return instead of requiring them to be recalculated on each request. Helps accelerate the model load/bake process.
items.zh: 全版本共有。模型会返回§bRenderMaterial§r（纹理）的集合和依赖项列表，现在游戏会记忆它们，而不是要求它们在每次请求中都重新计算一次。这有助于加速模型加载/烘焙的进程。

items.en: All versions. Saves the generated list of stronghold positions with the world, instead of regenerating it on every world load. Saves a little bit of time on 1.16, and quite a bit more on 1.18 and 1.19.
items.zh: 全版本共有。将生成的要塞位置列表与世界一起保存，免得每次加载世界时都重新生成。在1.16版本中可以减少一点世界加载时间，在1.18和1.19中减少的会多得多。

items.en: All versions. Many mods ship outdated structure files, which requires the game to upgrade them using DFU every single time they are loaded. This can be quite slow. This patch adds logic to instead save the upgraded version of the structure, and reuse it on the next load. To handle the case that the mod changes a structure file but not the name, the original file's hash is compared against the cached version, and if they do not match the structure will be upgraded again.
items.zh: 全版本共有。许多模组的结构文件已经过时，这就要求游戏在每次加载它们时都要用DFU来升级它们。这个升级过程可能会很慢。此补丁添加了一些逻辑，保存结构的升级版本，并在下次加载时直接重用它们。为了处理模组改变了结构文件但没有改变名称的情况，原始文件的哈希值将与被缓存的版本进行比较，若不匹配，该结构将被再次升级。

items.en: 1.16 only. Minor optimization borrowed from Hydrogen, which attempts to save space in the biome container when possible. This gets disabled automatically if conflicting mods like BetterEnd or Chocolate are installed.
items.zh: 仅1.16。微优化，借鉴了氢（Hydrogen）模组，试图尽可能节省生物群系容器的空间。如果安装了更好的末地或Chocolate Fix等与此功能冲突的模组，此功能会自动禁用。

items.en: All versions. Reduces log spam and possibly slightly improves loading speed by not printing the stacktraces for some commonly thrown exceptions during datapack reload (e.g. missing items in loot tables/recipes). The message is still printed.
items.zh: 全版本共有。数据包重载过程中不再打印一些常见异常（如战利品表/配方中的物品丢失）的堆栈跟踪，减少日志刷屏，且可能稍微提高了启动速度。只是不打印堆栈，一条异常消息依然会被打印出来。

items.en: All versions. Moves resource pack and data pack reloading to a dedicated worker pool instead of using the default `Worker-Main` threads. This allows mods to Smooth Boot to still potentially improve singleplayer performance at runtime while not slowing down launch due to a limited thread count.
items.zh: 全版本共有。将资源包和数据包的重载任务转移到一个专门的工作线程上，而不是使用默认的主工作线程。这让流畅加载（Smooth Boot）模组在运行时仍然可能提高单人游戏的性能，同时不会因为线程数量限制减慢启动速度。

items.en: All versions, but disabled by default due to load time impact. Deduplicates resource location namespaces and paths. This saves RAM but also increases the cost of constructing a new `ResourceLocation` by quite a bit.
items.zh: 全版本共有，但由于会影响加载时间，默认禁用。对资源位置的命名空间和路径进行去重。这节省了内存，但也大大增加了新资源位置的构造成本。

items.en: All versions. Modifies DFU initialization to happen the first time something needs to be upgraded. This sounds similar to LazyDFU but is distinctly implemented, as it avoids loading *any* DFU classes/data structures, while LazyDFU only disables rule optimization. Essentially, this option is a safer version of DataFixerSlayer as it will still load DFU when needed.\n\nYou should typically continue to use LazyDFU even with this option enabled, as otherwise DFU rule optimization will cause lag.
items.zh: 全版本共有。修改了DFU的初始化，使其仅在第一次需要升级数据时加载。这听起来类似DFU载入优化，但实现方式截然不同，因为它能避免加载§o任何§rDFU类/数据结构，而DFU载入优化只是禁用其规则优化。本质上说，这是一个DataFixerSlayer的安全版本，因为它仍然会在需要时加载DFU。\n\n即使启用了这个选项，你也应该继续使用DFU载入优化，否则DFU规则优化依然会导致卡顿。
全版本共有。详见https://github.com/Kasualix/ModernFix/wiki/动态资源加载---常见问题解答。

items.en: All versions. Allows the game to unload sounds, instead of sounds indefinitely persisting after being loaded.
items.zh: 全版本共有。允许游戏卸载声音，而不是在加载声音后无限期地保留它们。

items.en: All versions. Allows the game to unload structure files after generation concludes instead of keeping them loaded forever.
items.zh: 全版本共有。允许游戏在结构生成结束后卸载结构文件，而非让它们永远处于已加载状态。

items.en: All versions. Forge needlessly looks up a method via reflection every single time a registry is validated. This patch simply caches the returned value since it will be the same every time.
items.zh: 全版本共有。每次验证注册时，Forge都会通过反射来查找一个方法，这完全没必要。这个补丁简单地缓存了方法的返回值，因为它每次都是一样的。

items.en: All versions. Optimizes the font renderer to load fonts faster, speeding up resource reload.
items.zh: 全版本共有。优化字体渲染器，以更快地加载字体，加快资源重载速度。

items.en: All versions. Avoids rendering the sides of items in GUIs. (Yes, vanilla appears to do that.)\n\nThis can triple FPS with a mod like REI/JEI installed on weaker GPUs, if enough items are visible. Disabled by default since it's new and not tested much, but should be safe. The most likely issue is items being completely invisible in GUIs, or appearing flat in the world.
