items.zh: 全版本共有。避免在GUI中渲染物品的侧面。（是的，原版似乎就是这样做的。）\n\n如果你的显卡比较差，又安装了REI/JEI这类模组，且GUI中显示了有够多的物品，此功能甚至可以使FPS增加2倍。由于此优化刚刚诞生，没有经过很多测试，所以默认情况下是禁用的，但应该能安全使用。最有可能出现的问题是物品在GUI中完全不可见，或者在世界中显示为平面。

items.en: All versions pre 1.19.4. Avoids reading textures twice (the first time using a very slow code path) and instead does one faster load (similar to 1.19.3+).
items.zh: 所有1.19.4之前的版本。避免读取两次纹理资源（第一次读取使用的是非常慢的代码路径），仅使用更快的第二次读取逻辑（类似于1.19.3+）。

items.en: All versions. Enables the game to use a faster texture stitching system originally written by SuperCoder79 for lwjgl3ify on 1.7.10, which can save some time during loading. Rarely, it's been reported to cause weird artifacts on blocks or in GUIs, this may be a Sodium bug.
items.zh: 全版本共有。使游戏能够使用一个效率更高的纹理拼接系统，该系统最初由SuperCoder79在1.7.10上为lwjgl3ify编写，此项可以减少一点加载时间。偶尔，有人报告说这会在方块或GUI上引起奇怪的显示假象，这可能是钠（Sodium）模组的程序错误。

items.en: 1.16 only. Optimizes Just Enough Resources to not needlessly recreate villager entities many times for the same profession, which saves time during JEI startup.
items.zh: 仅1.16。优化了JER（Just Enough Resources），让其不需要为同一职业多次创建村民实体，这在JEI启动时可以节省时间。

items.en: 1.16 only. Optimizations to KubeJS to avoid needless `ItemStack` copying, etc., which reduces the time taken to load datapacks.
items.zh: 仅1.16。对KubeJS进行了优化，以避免不必要的§bItemStack§r复制等，减少了数据包加载时间。

items.en: All versions. Implements optimizations to speed up the model loading process.
items.zh: 全版本共有。通过优化以加快模型加载过程。

items.en: All versions. Uses a more efficient backing map for compound NBT tags that deduplicates key names and also uses an array map for very small compounds. This reduces the overhead of storing many compound tags in memory.
items.zh: 全版本共有。对复合NBT标签使用一个更加高效的支持映射（backing map），从而消除重复键名，对小型复合 NBT 也使用数组映射。这减少了在内存中存储许多复合NBT标签的开销。

items.en: 1.16 only, inspired by Hydrogen. Avoids storing chunk sections that are full of air in memory, instead marking them as empty.
items.zh: 仅1.16。灵感来自氢（Hydrogen）模组。将存储充满空气的区块部分标记为空（empty），避免在内存中存储它们。

items.en:
All versions. **A key optimization.** Newer Minecraft versions (after 1.12) implemented a blockstate cache system that caches frequently used information about a blockstate, such as whether it is solid, its collision shape, etc. Rebuilding this cache is quite fast in vanilla (it takes only a second or two) but is quite slow with many mods installed, as there are many more blockstates present in the game which all must have their caches rebuilt.

This problem is exacerbated by Forge as the cache is rebuilt at many points when the data would almost certainly be unused before the next rebuild. Examples include right before reaching the main menu (during the "Freezing data" stage), as well as multiple (!) times when a world is being loaded.

ModernFix solves this performance bottleneck by instead making cache rebuilds lazy. Each blockstate rebuilds its cache the first time the data would be accessed. At any point when vanilla or Forge would attempt to rebuild caches for all blockstates, this is redirected to simply invalidate the cache on each blockstate instead.

This should not have any impact on TPS after startup concludes.
items.zh:
全版本共有。§l一项关键优化。§r较新的Minecraft（1.12以上）实现了一个方块状态缓存系统，它可以缓存方块状态的常用信息，譬如其是否为固体方块，它的碰撞箱形状等等。原版中重建此缓存非常快（只要一两秒钟），但在安装了许多模组后就相当慢了，因为游戏中多了很多其它的方块状态，它们的缓存都需要被其重建。

在Forge的影响下，这个问题变得更加严重，因为缓存会在很多地方重建，但这些数据在下一次重建前几乎肯定不会被用到。至于在哪儿，比如，在到达主菜单之前（在“Freezing data”阶段），以及在加载世界时（会出现很多次！）。

通过让缓存重建转为惰性，现代化修复解决了这个性能瓶颈问题。每个方块状态在第一次访问数据时都会重建其缓存。无论何时，原版或Forge试图重建所有方块状态缓存的行为都会被重定向，变成简单地使每个方块状态的缓存失效。

此项优化应该不会对启动后的TPS产生任何影响。

items.en: All versions. Removes the biome temperature cache as Lithium does on modern versions.
items.zh: 全版本共有。移除生物群系温度缓存，以减少内存占用，就像新版本的锂所做的那样。

items.en:
All versions. **A key optimization.** Launches on modern versions are heavily bottlenecked by filesystem access. Many requests are frequently made to resource packs to list resources or check if a given resource exists, and each of these result in a very slow file API call.

ModernFix completely eliminates most of the bottleneck here by simply caching a listing of all resources that exist within mod-provided and vanilla resourcepacks. The cache is rebuilt on resource reload (except for the vanilla resources, since they should never change while the game is running).

There are no known compatibility issues with this patch except for OptiFine (its CTM resources do not load correctly). However I do not recommend using OptiFine in any scenario, as it adds several minutes to launch time by itself and is not tested with ModernFix at all.
items.zh:
全版本共有。§l一项关键优化。§r高版本的启动严重受到文件系统访问的瓶颈限制。资源包经常接受到很多请求，要列出资源或检查一项给定的资源是否存在，而每次请求都会调用一个效率极低的文件API。

现代化修复通过简单地缓存模组和原版提供的所有资源的列表，完全消除了此处的大部分瓶颈。缓存在资源重载时会进行重建（除了原版资源，因为它们在游戏运行时不应改变）。

高清修复不能正确加载它的连接纹理（CTM）资源，除此之外此补丁没有已知的兼容问题。不过，我不建议在任何情况下使用高清修复，因为它本身就会增加几分钟的启动时间，而且根本没有与现代化修复进行过任何测试。

items.en: 1.16 only. Attempts to speed up switching between singleplayer worlds by skipping the datapack reload when possible. May cause compatibility issues with some mods, but is currently enabled by default.
items.zh: 仅1.16。试图尽可能跳过数据包重载，来加快单人世界切换/重进时的速度。可能会导致一些模组的兼容性问题，但目前默认启用。

items.en: All versions. **Currently semi-broken.** Aggressively replaces some internals of the Forge registry system with faster versions, however it currently causes freezes when loading some modpacks. Off by default for obvious reasons.
items.zh: 全版本共有。§l目前处于半残状态。§r非常暴力地使用更快地版本替换了Forge注册系统的一些内部结构，但目前在加载一些整合包时会导致冻结。默认关闭，原因显而易见。

items.en:
1.16 & 1.19 only. **A key optimization.**

In the middle of the 1.16 development cycle, Forge patched the game to reload datapacks twice when loading an existing world, in order to fix an issue with biome ID shifting. Unfortunately, datapack reloads often take upwards of 30 seconds and so this very severely affects world loading times.

ModernFix makes the necessary changes to avoid this reload, based on the unfinished Forge PR #8163.

This change was removed by Forge in 1.18, but then a similar patch was added *again* in 1.19 to fix mod datapacks not being loaded when creating new singleplayer worlds. Fortunately, the issue is localized to the world creation screen in 1.19, and existing worlds only require a single reload. However, this still doubles the length of the lag spike when clicking "Create New World" in 1.19, and so ModernFix again makes changes to not perform a redundant reload.
items.zh:
仅1.16&1.19。§l一项关键优化。§r

在1.16开发周期的中期，Forge对游戏打了补丁，在加载现有世界时重载两次数据包，来解决生物群系ID转移的问题。不幸地是，数据包重载往往需要30秒以上的时间，所以这非常严重地影响了世界加载时间。

基于未完成的Forge PR#8163，现代化修复做了必要的修改来避免这种重载。

Forge在1.18版本删除了此改动，但随后在1.19版本中§o又再次§r添加了一个类似补丁，来修复新建单人世界时无法加载模组数据包的问题。幸运的是，在1.19版本中此问题仅限于世界创建屏幕，现有的世界只需要重载一次。然而，在1.19版本中点击“创建新世界”时，这依然使卡顿峰值的长度翻倍，因此现代化修复再次做出修改，不执行多余的重载。

items.en: All versions. Enabled only if FerriteCore is installed. Takes advantage of FerriteCore's handling of blockstates to speed up their creation. This can help speed up launch with mods that add lots of blockstates, such as furniture mods.
items.zh: 全版本共有。只在安装铁氧体磁芯时启用。利用铁氧体磁芯处理方块状态，加快方块状态的创建速度。在你安装了添加大量方块状态的模组（例如家具模组）时，此项优化有助于加快启动速度。

items.en: All versions. Avoids having the main thread spin idly consuming one CPU core while waiting for the modloading workers to finish.
items.zh: 全版本共有。主线程在等待模组加载工作线程结束时，不再占着一个CPU核心在那空转。

items.en: All versions. Adjusts the worker and server thread priorities to be lower than the client thread. This helps improve FPS stability on machines with few CPU cores, provided that the Java implementation in use respects priorities.
items.zh: 全版本共有。调整工作线程和服务端线程的优先级，使其低于客户端线程。这有助于使CPU核心较少的电脑FPS更稳定，只要其使用的Java实现能尊重优先级。

items.en: Mostly for 1.16. Patches JEResources to use the integrated server's loot table data if playing singleplayer, rather than pointlessly reloading loot tables. Saves a couple more seconds during JEI startup.
items.zh: 主要针对1.16版本。为JER（Just Enough Resources）打补丁，使其在单人游戏中直接使用内置服务端的战利品表数据，而不是无意义地重载战利品表。可以减少几秒钟的JEI启动时间。

items.en: The patches in this group fix concurrency-related issues within Minecraft and/or Forge. Most of them result in rare, hard-to-diagnose crashes during loading.
items.zh: 这组补丁修复了MC和/或Forge中的一些并发问题。其中大部分问题都会导致在加载过程中出现罕见的、难以诊断的崩溃。

items.en: This option is a port of SuperCoder's Chunk Saving Fix mod (because I didn't realize it was already available for Forge at the time).
items.zh: 此项是SuperCoder的区块保存修复（Chunk Saving Fix）模组的移植（因为我当时没发现它其实有Forge版本）。

items.en: This option fixes a deadlock that can occur if an exception is thrown while processing entity data. Vanilla does not correctly unlock the data manager when it should. This is tracked as MC-218112 on the bug tracker, and was fixed by Mojang in 1.17.
items.zh: 在处理实体数据时抛出异常可能导致死锁，此项修复了这个问题。原版在应该解锁数据管理器的时候却不能正常解锁。问题追踪器链接：MC-218112，由Mojang在1.17中修复。

items.en: **Experimental**, not enabled by default. An attempted fix for the memory leak issue that occurs after playing long enough on 1.16.
items.zh: §l实验性功能§r，默认禁用。尝试修复在1.16版本上长时间游玩后出现的内存泄漏问题。

items.en: 1.18 and newer. **A key optimization.** Ports a patch from Paper that fixes issues on 1.17 with chunkloading requiring huge amounts of memory and generating many `CompletableFuture` instances. 1.18+ are now able to load worlds on only 400MB of memory like 1.16 could.
items.zh: 仅1.18+。§l一项关键优化§r。移植了Paper服务端的一个补丁，修复了1.17版本中区块加载需要大量内存和产生许多§bCompletableFuture§r实例的问题。1.18以上版本现在能够像1.16版本那样仅用400MB的内存加载世界。

items.en: Patches Twilight Forest to perform non-thread-safe client setup using the main thread as it should, rather than the FML worker thread.
items.zh: 给暮色森林模组打了补丁，对于非线程安全的客户端启动，执行时，不再使用FML工作线程，转用它本该用的主线程。

items.en: Adds ModernFix to the branding list on the title screen, and also to the F3 screen.
items.zh: 将现代化修复相关信息添加到标题界面和F3屏幕中。

items.en: Normally off, can be enabled to force the raw stack trace to be dumped to the log when a crash occurs. Occasionally vanilla's crash report system fails to work properly and gives an entirely irrelevant stack trace/report.
items.zh: 通常关闭，启用后，在发生崩溃时，它会将原始堆栈踪迹强制转储到日志里。因为原版的崩溃报告系统偶尔不能正常工作，只能给出一个完全不相关的堆栈跟踪/报告。

items.en: Uses a couple injections to measure world load time, datapack reload time, resource reload time, bootstrap time, and adds the necessary hooks to enable vanilla's unused profiler logic for resource reloading if so configured.
items.zh: 借助几个注入来测量世界加载时间、数据包重载时间、资源重载时间、启动时间，并添加必要的挂钩，以启用原版未使用的分析器逻辑，该逻辑用于分析资源重载过程。

items.en: **To be used for debugging purposes only.** Causes a thread dump to be output to the log every 60 seconds. This can help to diagnose unexplained freezes during loading/gameplay.
items.zh: §l仅用于调试目的。§r使线程转储每60秒向日志输出一次数据。这可以帮助诊断加载/游戏过程中无法解释的冻结现象。

items.en: Attempts to prevent chunk system deadlocks or provide additional debug information in the log when they occur. These deadlocks usually manifest as the server freezing indefinitely (e.g. entities not moving), while the client continues to work just fine.
items.zh: 尝试预防区块系统死锁，或者，仍然发生死锁时，在日志中提供额外的调试信息。这些死锁通常表现为服务端无限期冻结（其表现例如实体不移动），而客户端继续正常工作。

items.en: Patches Valhesia Structures to fix an issue in its code that causes frequent worldgen/chunkloading deadlocks.
items.zh: 为Valhesia Structures模组打补丁，修复其代码的问题，具体表现：频繁产生世界生成/区块加载死锁。

items.en: Fixes a multithreading issue in CoFH Core that can cause rare crashes during launch.
items.zh: 修复了CoFH核心（CoFH Core）模组的一个多线程问题，具体表现：启动游戏时偶尔崩溃。

items.en: Fixes a multithreading issue in ConnectedTexturesMod that can cause rare crashes during launch.
items.zh: 修复了连接纹理（ConnectedTexturesMod）模组的一个多线程问题，具体表现：启动游戏时偶尔崩溃。

items.en: Fixes a memory leak in vanilla caused by the ender dragon retaining a reference to the previous client world.
items.zh: 修复了一处原版内存泄漏，它由末影龙保留对先前客户端世界的引用而产生。

items.en: Fixes many issues where EntityJoinWorldEvent/EntityJoinLevelEvent cause a worldgen deadlock, by slightly deferring entity loading. Should not, however, cause any noticeable behavior changes in-game.
items.zh: 针对§b实体加入世界事件（EntityJoinWorldEvent/EntityJoinLevelEvent）§r，稍微推迟了实体加载，修复了许多会产生世界生成死锁的问题。不过，这应该不会在游戏中引起任何明显的行为变化。

items.en: Fixes Forge configs occasionally becoming corrupted when launching the game.
items.zh: 修复了Forge配置在启动游戏时偶尔损坏的问题。
修复了MC-258939（非原子缓存状态可能产生多线程崩溃）

items.en: Makes the game window retain its existing size when control is handed over from Forge's early loading to Minecraft code. Fixes the window teleporting back to the center of the screen after being dragged, etc.
items.zh: 在控制权被从Forge的早期加载移交给Minecraft代码时，使游戏窗口保留其现有大小。修复了窗口被拖动后还会传送回屏幕中央等问题。

items.en: Fixes Refined Storage external storage blocks occasionally failing to show contents of drawers, etc. when loaded. Backport of Refined Storage PR #3435, which was only applied to 1.18 and later.
items.zh: 如果安装了精致存储模组，会修复它的一些问题，比如，外部存储总线偶尔无法显示抽屉内容。这是精致存储PR #3435的向后移植，仅适用于1.18及更高版本。

items.en: Fixes zombie pigmen keeping the 0, 0 chunk loaded perpetually on Forge. Backport of Forge PR #8583.
items.zh: 修复了Forge上僵尸猪人使（0, 0）区块永久加载的问题。这是Forge PR #8583的向后移植。

items.en: Fixes an occasional Starlight crash due to emptiness maps not being initialized. Backport of the same fix in Starlight for 1.18.x.
items.zh: 修复了星光偶尔崩溃的问题，崩溃元凶是空地图未初始化。这是星光（Starlight）1.18.x中相同修复的向后移植。

items.en: Core patches required for ModernFix to work
items.zh: 现代化修复正常运作所需的核心补丁

items.en: Patches used when running in a development environment, for speed improvement and/or testing
items.zh: 在开发环境中运行时，用于提高速度和/或测试目的的补丁

items.en: Concurrency patches to prevent crashes during launch
items.zh: 并发补丁，用于预防启动时崩溃

items.en: Adds the vanilla watchdog to singleplayer worlds as well, but just prints out the stacktraces rather than forcefully terminating the world. This version includes the functionality of Fullstack Watchdog, but the latter is still needed for multiplayer.
items.zh: 将原版看门狗添加到单人游戏世界中，但只是打印出堆栈跟踪，而不会强制终止世界。此版本包括全栈看门狗的功能，但多人游戏仍然需要后者。

items.en: Adds easter egg features (does not affect any vanilla visuals or behavior) when running on a snapshot version.
items.zh: 在快照版本上运行时，添加复活节彩蛋功能（不影响任何原版视觉效果或行为）。

items.en: If enabled, and a compatible version of Spark is installed, the entire launch sequence will be profiled until the main menu.
items.zh: 如果安装了兼容版本的火花（Spark）模组，启用后将分析主菜单之前的完整启动序列。

items.en: Shows a warning on startup if other performance mods considered essential and highly compatible are not present
items.zh: 一些性能模组被认为是必不可少且高度兼容的，如果没有安装这些模组，会在启动时显示警告

items.en: Replaces Forge's resource finder (used to find game and a mod code) with a significantly faster version, speeding up launch
items.zh: 将Forge的资源查找器（用于查找游戏和模组的代码）替换为明显更快的版本，从而加快启动速度

items.en: Reduces memory usage by clearing mapping data structures in Fabric Loader that are either redundant or rarely used by mods. Off by default for compatibility reasons.
items.zh: 清除Fabric加载器中冗余或很少被模组使用的映射数据结构，来减少内存占用。出于兼容性原因，默认关闭。

items.en: Force-loads all mixins when launch finishes and then clears out mixin data structures to remove most of Mixin's memory footprint. Disabled by default for compatibility reasons.
items.zh: 在启动结束时强制加载所有mixin，然后清除mixin数据结构，使Mixin减少大半内存占用。出于兼容性原因，默认禁用。

items.en: Makes most wall blocks share the same shape object instead of each one having its own copy. Can reduce memory usage substantially when lots of wall blocks are added by mods.
items.zh: 使大多数墙方块共享同一个形状对象，而不是每个墙方块都拥有属于自己的副本。当模组添加大量墙方块时，可以大大减少其带来的内存占用。

items.en: AE2 compatibility patch for dynamic resources
items.zh: 动态资源功能的兼容性补丁，用于应用能源2模组

items.en: CTM compatibility patch for dynamic resources
items.zh: 动态资源功能的兼容性补丁，用于连接纹理（CTM）模组

items.en: LDLib compatibility patch for dynamic resources
Refined Storage compatibility patch for dynamic resources
items.zh: 动态资源功能的兼容性补丁，用于精致存储模组

items.en: SuperMartijn642CoreLib compatibility patch for dynamic resources
items.zh: 动态资源功能的兼容性补丁，用于SuperMartijn642CoreLib模组

items.en: Diagonal Fences compatibility patch for dynamic resources
items.zh: 动态资源功能的兼容性补丁，用于对角线栅栏（Diagonal Fences）模组

items.en: Rewrites the advancement checking logic to be faster and not cause StackOverflowError in large packs. Port of Advancements Debug from Fabric.
items.zh: 重写进度检查逻辑，使其更快，且在大型整合包里不再会产生§b堆栈溢出错误（StackOverflowError）§r。这是Fabric进度调试功能的移植。

items.en: Fix Patchouli books storing many empty items with NBT tags, reducing memory usage.
items.zh: 针对帕秋莉手册模组，修复其书籍会存储许多带有NBT标签的空条目的问题，减少了内存占用。

items.en: Completely removes spawn chunks from the game. They are no longer loaded at all, unlike Ksyxis.
items.zh: 从游戏中完全删除出生点区块（spawn chunks）。它们彻底不再加载了，这点与Ksyxis不同。

items.en: Fixes Blueprint's ObjectModificationManager leaking vanilla resources, reducing memory usage. Despite the fix being contributed in PR #195 a release was not yet made.
items.zh: 针对蓝图（Blueprint）模组，修复其§bObjectModificationManager§r泄漏原版资源的问题，减少了内存占用。尽管我已经贡献了修复代码（PR #195），但包含此修复代码的新版本尚未发布。

items.en: Fixes the game failing to load worlds if dimension mods are removed. Backport of Forge PR #8959.
items.zh: 修复了删除维度模组后游戏无法加载世界的问题。这是Forge PR #8959的向后移植。

items.en: Fixes memory waste caused by some legacy servers (e.g. Hypixel) sending empty chunks as if they contain blocks. Reduces memory usage significantly on these servers.
items.zh: 某些传统服务器（例如Hypixel）会认为空区块包含方块，照常发送这些区块，从而浪费内存。此项修复了这个问题，显著减少了这些服务器上的内存占用。

items.en: Deduplicates climate parameter objects used by the new biome system, can save ~2MB but also slows down datapack reload somewhat.
items.zh: 新的生物群系系统使用了气候参数（climate parameter）对象，对其进行去重，可以节省约2MB内存，但也在一定程度上减慢了数据包的重载速度。

items.en: Constructs entity models the first time they are seen instead of during launch. Some mods are not compatible with this option and will cause EntityRenderer crashes.
items.zh: 实体模型在实体首次出现时构造，而不是在启动时构造。某些模组与此项不兼容，会导致§b实体渲染器（EntityRenderer）§r崩溃。

items.en: Fixes lag caused by Twilight Forest worldgen checking structures very inefficiently
items.zh: 针对暮色森林模组，修复了其世界生成检查结构效率极低导致卡顿的问题

items.en: Speeds up Forge registry freezing during launch by using a faster code path
items.zh: 使用更快的代码路径，加快启动时Forge注册表的冻结速度

items.en: Speeds up uses of tag entries by caching the location object instead of recreating it every time
items.zh: 缓存位置对象，不再每次都重新创建它，这可以加快标签条目的使用速度

items.en: Stores the glyphs for the Unicode font more efficiently. Kudos to @AnAwesomGuy for the trick.
Reduces the memory usage of old client-side worlds that aren't needed after switching dimensions. These are normally garbage collected in vanilla, but mods sometimes retain references to them.
items.zh: 减少切换维度后不需要的旧客户端世界的内存占用。这部分内存在原版中通常会被垃圾回收，但有时模组会保留对它们的引用。

items.en: (Fabric) Experimental option that reduces the memory usage of registries by roughly 50%. Not useful in most modpacks unless they contain millions of blocks and items.
items.zh: （Fabric）实验性选项，可将注册表的内存占用减少约 50%。在大多数整合包中没什么用，除非它们包含数百万个方块和物品。

items.en: Avoids storing a codec for every block(state) and instead generates and caches it on the fly when needed. Generally not worth enabling unless you have a million blocks/items.
items.zh: 不再给每个方块（状态）都存储一个编解码器，只在需要时动态生成、缓存它。通常不值得启用，除非你有一百万个方块/物品。

items.en: Mitigate lag when there are hundreds of thousands of suggestions while typing a command
items.zh: 在输入命令时，若有数十万个建议，可以缓解卡顿。

items.en: Fixes an issue causing registration of blocks/items to slow down proportional to the number already registered. This improves startup time.
items.zh: 修复了一个问题，它会导致方块/物品的注册速度减慢，减慢的程度与已注册的数量成正比。这缩短了启动时间。

items.en: Avoids pointlessly creating a URL object and speeds up skull block rendering.
items.zh: 避免毫无意义地创建一个URL对象，加速头颅方块的渲染。

items.en: Fixes Forge issue #9118, where mods can cause undebuggable render crashes by pushing the matrix stack without popping it.
items.zh: 修复了Forge的#9118号问题，这个问题会导致模组在不弹出已经推入的MatrixStack时有概率触发无法诊断的渲染崩溃。

items.en: Fixes a security issue with the worldgen settings file dialog
items.zh: 修复了在世界生成设置的文件选择对话框中的一个安全问题。

items.en: Fixes a bug introduced by a Forge patch that causes excessive amounts of chunk data packets to be sent to the player if they are riding a vehicle on a chunk border.
items.zh: 修复了一个由Forge补丁引入的问题，此问题会导致玩家在区块边界上乘坐交通工具时，服务器向该玩家发送非常大量的区块数据包。

items.en: Fixes a bug in Mantle that can cause random ConcurrentModificationException crashes when rendering Tinkers Construct content.
items.zh: 修复了地幔（Mantle）的一个问题，此问题会导致渲染匠魂相关内容时毫无规律地触发并发修改异常（ConcurrentModificationException）而崩溃。

items.en: Works around design flaws in the Forge ModelDataManager system that can cause unexpected concurrency issues.
items.zh: 规避Forge的ModelDataManager的一些设计缺陷，这些缺陷可能导致突发性的并发问题。

items.en: Fixes Forge clients being disconnected when connecting to a vanilla server if mods add custom recipe book entry types.
items.zh: 修复具有模组额外添加的配方书条目类型的Forge客户端在连接到原版服务器时强制断连的问题。

items.en: Fixes various ConcurrentModificationExceptions that can occur in content mods when computing block shapes
items.zh: 修复内容型模组在计算方块形状时可能发生的并发修改异常（ConcurrentModificationException）

items.en: This option may help to detect the cause of chunkloading freezes. However, leaving it enabled may cause slightly worse performance.
items.zh: 此选项对检测区块加载冻结可能有所帮助。不过，开启此选项也可能导致轻微性能下降。

items.en: Fixes Minecraft's built-in wait function consuming excessive amounts of CPU resources.
items.zh: 修复Minecraft内置的wait函数（方法）消耗过量CPU资源的问题。

items.en: Small micro-optimization that makes retrieving custom entity data slightly more efficient on Forge.
items.zh: 微优化，让Forge在获取自定义实体数据上更有效率一点。

items.en: Fixes oversights in Forge that lead to excessive allocation in hot registry methods.
items.zh: 修复Forge注册系统的一些疏漏，其会使得其中的热点方法产生过量的内存分配需求。

items.en: Fixes MC-272431, which tracks the ender dragon being unable to dive to the portal as it did in 1.13 and older. This causes the dragon to fly quite a bit differently from what modern players are used to and also patches out one-cycling, so it's not enabled by default. Thanks to Jukitsu for identifying the regression in the vanilla code.

Hypixel sends chunks to the client that are missing some block entity data, which makes chests etc. appear invisible. This 'fixes' the problem by creating the needed data on the client. Has no effect for properly behaved servers or in singleplayer.

Attempts to work around mods constructing BufferBuilder objects that leak memory. This can cause the JVM to crash with an hs_err_pid file in some rare cases. If you experience this type of crash, try disabling this option.
Fixes the experimental feature warning being shown still being shown the first time you reopen a world that was created as experimental.

Fixes a major oversight in Forge's early error handling code that causes some parts of mods to load, but not others, which usually results in the game crashing rather than displaying the intended error screen. This issue was fixed in NeoForge, and eventually fixed in new enough versions of Forge.
Fixes MC-251068, where deleting the last world takes you back to an empty world list.

**This is a debug option and should not be enabled for regular gameplay.** Attempts to detect mods interacting with block entities on the wrong thread and crash the game with more information, rather than an unclear ConcurrentModificationException

Disables the game's use of worker threads for the server and for chunk rendering. **This will make performance worse on almost all hardware**, and should only be enabled on a client, when you know exactly what you are doing, and probably only on hardware with very few (2 or less) physical CPU cores. In those rare cases, it can reduce lag spikes since there is less contention over the limited cores.

Runs the Forge loading screen on a background thread for part of the loading process, to allow progress to be shown while content is being registered. May have compatibility issues with some GPU drivers (e.g. macOS), so do not enable it by default in a modpack.

Prevents the Minecraft client from obtaining the keypair for chat signing. This disables the client's ability to sign chat messages (like No Chat Reports, but in a simpler, albeit less user-friendly way).
Prevents the Minecraft client from sending telemetry to Mojang. The telemetry is generally not relevant to them anyway for a modded instance.
Implements some minor optimizations to the vanilla chunk meshing logic (they will have no effect with a mod that replaces chunk rendering entirely).
Improves the speed at which structures like buried treasure can be located.
Fixes more oversights in Forge that lead to excessive allocation in hot registry methods.

Improves on vanilla's existing caching for creative tab contents in a way that is compatible with the timing requirements of mods like JEI/EMI. This can reduce the lag spike when opening the creative inventory for the first time in a modpack.
Optimizes the Forge event for finding potential mobs that can spawn. This reduces allocations and the overhead of rebuilding a weighted list when no mods modify the potential spawns.
Optimizes chunk ticking in vanilla to reduce allocations.
Optimizes some world generation logic in vanilla to reduce object allocations.
Prevents the game from logging a very long stacktrace when the narrator fails to load on Linux (usually caused by not having libflite installed).
A mod that changes how multiple types of culling are handled in order to improve performance
items.zh: 一个改变多种类型的剔除方式以提升性能的模组

items.en: Add block id here to prevent it from culling. for example minecraft:bamboo
Changing the opengl winding order to apply face culling
items.zh: 更改OpenGL环绕顺序以应用面剔除

items.en: Culls sign text so that it wont render when you can't see it in some cases
items.zh: 剔除告示牌文本，在某些情况下当你看不到它时，它就不会渲染
启用视景内的雨雪剔除

items.en: Does frustum culling on beacon beams
items.zh: 对信标光柱使用视锥剔除

items.en: This only helps if your gpu is the bottleneck and your cpu has some performance to spare!
items.zh: 这只有在GPU瓶颈并且CPU有剩余性能的情况下才有帮助！
启用激进的方块状态剔除
自定义物品展示框渲染器

items.en: Enables the custom item frame renderer
items.zh: 启用自定义物品展示框渲染器

items.en: Enables Map culling in item frames
items.zh: 在物品展示框中启用地图剔除
启用物品展示框多层次细节
展示框多层次细节范围

items.en: Change the distance that this culling starts to work at
items.zh: 更改剔除开始运作的距离

items.en: Change the distance that this culling starts to work at, may be visible at smaller distances
items.zh: 更改剔除开始运作的距离，在更小的距离上可能可见

items.en: Culls back and inner faces of the painting
Change the type of culling used for leaves
items.zh: 更改用于树叶的剔除类型

items.en: Change how much leaves should check for Depth-based culling. Lower is faster!
items.zh: 更改基于深度剔除树叶的检测数量，越低越快！

items.en: Will only cull Mangrove Roots when using: %s
items.zh: 使用时将只剔除红树根：%s

items.en: If mangrove roots should also be culled using the same way. BlockState does not work!
items.zh: 红树根也应该用同样的方式被剔除。方块状态不起作用

items.en: Fixes powder snow not culling against solid faces
items.zh: 修复细雪不剔除固体方块面的问题

items.en: Makes it possible for other blocks to cull against end gateways
items.zh: 使其他方块能对末地折跃门进行剔除

items.en: If blockstate culling should work on modded blocks by default
items.zh: 默认情况下，方块状态剔除是否在模组的方块上运作

items.en: This option is disabled when using: %s
Strips cryptographic signatures from player messages, making it impossible to track and associate them with your Microsoft account, as well as to use the Player Chat Reporting feature.
items.zh: 从玩家消息中剥离加密签名，使其无法跟踪并与你的Microsoft帐户关联，以及使用聊天举报功能。

items.en: This option cannot work with No Chat Reports, since there are no signatures to verify.
items.zh: 此选项被No Chat Reports禁用。

items.en: Chat reports are disabled on this server, courtesy of No Chat Reports.
items.zh: 聊天举报在此服务器上被No Chat Reports禁用。

items.en: This server does not have No Chat Reports and you have configured it to require itself on server.
items.zh: 此服务器没有安装No Chat Reports，但你已将其配置为要求服务器上安装。

items.en: Left-click to cycle between signing modes.
items.zh: 左键单击以切换签名模式。

items.en: This server has No Chat Reports installed, or prevents your messages from being reportable in some other known way. You can chat safely.
items.zh: 此服务器安装了No Chat Reports或采取了其他已知的措施防止聊天举报。你可以安全地聊天。

items.en: You can always chat safely in singleplayer and self-hosted LAN worlds.
items.zh: 你始终可以在单人游戏中安全地聊天。

items.en: This server allows you to send unsigned messages which cannot be reported to Mojang. Unless some kind of plugin is installed on the server that prevents chat reports - vanilla clients will still send signed messages, display unsigned messages as \"Unverified\" and not show them if \"Only Show Secure Chat\" is enabled in chat options.
items.zh: 此服务器没有安装No Chat Reports，但允许发送不能被举报给Mojang的未签名消息。除非服务器安装了一些防止聊天举报的插件，原版客户端仍会发送已签名的消息，将未签名消息显示为“未经验证”。如果在聊天设置中启用了“仅显示安全的聊天”，未签名消息不会被显示。

items.en: This server currently demands all chat messages to be signed. All signed messages are a potentially incriminating evidence that can be used against you in a chat report.
items.zh: 此服务器要求对所有聊天消息进行签名。所有签名的消息都是潜在的罪证，可能在举报中对你不利。建议使用聊天加密。

items.en: You have enabled chat signing, which makes all your messages a potentially incriminating evidence that can be used against you in a chat report.
items.zh: 你已经启用了聊天签名，这使你的所有消息都会成为在举报中对你不利的潜在罪证。

items.en: This is a Realms server. Not only is there no way to prevent chat reports here, but Mojang also employs automated chat monitoring to identify potential \"online harms\" and escalate them to human review, whether the owner of the Realm likes it or not. Your only hope is chat encryption.
items.zh: 这是Realms服务器。在这种情况下不仅无法阻止聊天举报，Mojang还使用自动聊天监控来识别潜在的“在线危害”，并将其升级以供人类审查，无论该Realm的所有者是否愿意。建议使用聊天加密。

items.en: No Chat Reports is not sure about safety of this server yet. Try sending a message in chat in order to evaluate it.
items.zh: No Chat Reports尚不确定此服务器的安全性。请尝试在聊天中发送消息以进行测试。

items.en: No Chat Reports could not evaluate the safety of this server. This should never happen, please report it as a bug to the mod developer.
items.zh: No Chat Reports无法检测此服务器的安全性。这不该发生，请将其作为Bug反馈给模组开发人员。

items.en: Chat signing is always enabled on Realms, since it is always required and disabling it would yield no benefit anyways.
items.zh: 聊天签名始终在Realms上启用，因为它始终是必需的，无法禁用。

items.en: Message signing is enabled for this session.
items.zh: 此会话已启用聊天签名。

items.en: Message signing is enabled for this session, but it will be disabled once you re-join.
items.zh: 此会话已启用聊天签名，但一旦你重新加入，它将被禁用。

items.en: Message signing is disabled for this session.
items.zh: 此会话已禁用聊天签名。

items.en: Message signing is disabled for this session, but it will be enabled once you send any message.
items.zh: 此会话已禁用聊天签名，但一旦你发送任何消息，它就会启用。

items.en: Message signing is disabled since this is an offline server.
items.zh: 聊天签名已被禁用，因为这是一个离线服务器。

items.en: Reload No Chat Reports config. Use carefully.
items.zh: 重新加载No Chat Reports配置。请小心使用。

items.en: §a§lSafe Server§r\nWe could verify that this server has No Chat Reports installed, or prevents chat reports in some other known way. You can chat safely there.
items.zh: §a§l安全的服务器§r\n我们可以确定此服务器安装了No Chat Reports，或者以其他已知方式阻止聊天举报。你可以安全地聊天。

items.en: §lNo Chat Reports:§r %1$s\nDisable or enable most of the mod's client-sided functionality. You may have to do this to join some Paper/Velocity servers, as they are known to cause issues with NCR.\nCertain networking-unrelated things, such as encryption, chat trust status tweaks and removal of vanilla's \"Chat messages can't be verified\" toast will still work; they can be disabled in config individually.
items.zh: §lNo Chat Reports：§r%1$s\n禁用或启用模组的大部分客户端功能。你可能必须这样做才能加入一些Paper/Velocity服务器，因为它们会导致模组出现问题。某些与网络无关的事情，如加密、聊天信任状态调整和删除原版的“聊天消息无法验证”警告弹窗仍然有效；它们可以在配置中单独禁用。

items.en:
§lEncryption:§r %1$s
Right-click to configure.

While encryption is enabled, you can prevent it from being applied to the message by holding %2$s when sending it.
items.zh: §l加密：§r%1$s\n右击以配置。\n当启用加密时，你可以通过在发送消息时按住%2$s来暂时关闭。

items.en: You can encrypt your messages using a secret key. Only people who know this key will be able to decrypt them. No Chat Reports will automatically decrypt all encrypted messages when a suitable key is provided and the feature is enabled.\nHowever, be aware that encryption is not a \"magic wand\" kind of solution. Moderators on third-party servers can mute or ban you for sending what will appear to them as a garbled mess in chat. Furthermore, it is recommended that you generate a custom encryption key and communicate it to other people only via secure channels. Click \"Learn More\" to learn more about how and when you should use encryption.
items.zh: 你可以使用密钥加密消息，只有知道此密钥的人才能解密它们。当提供合适的密钥并启用该功能时，No Chat Reports将自动解密所有加密消息。\n然而，请注意，加密不是一种万能的解决方案。第三方服务器的所有者可以禁止你发送聊天中看起来乱糟糟的内容。此外，建议你生成自定义加密密钥，并仅通过安全通道将其传递给其他人。单击“了解更多”以了解有关如何以及何时使用加密的更多信息。

items.en: §lEncryption Key§r\nKey that will be used to encrypt and decrypt your messages. Its format depends on the algorithm; for AES it will be 128 bits of Base64-encoded binary data.
items.zh: §l加密密钥§r\n用于加密和解密消息的密钥。它的格式取决于算法；对于AES，它将是128位的Base64编码二进制数据。

items.en: §lEncryption Passphrase§r\nInstead of generating a random key, you can derive one from a passphrase of your choice. If you use this - choose a strong one. Not all algorithms support passphrases.
items.zh: §l加密密码短语§r\n你可以从自己选择的密码中导出一个密钥，而不是生成随机密钥。如果你使用这个——选择一个强大的。并非所有算法都支持密码短语。

items.en: Generate a new random key with respect to the selected encryption algorithm.
items.zh: 针对所选加密算法生成新的随机密钥。

items.en: §lAES/CFB8+Base64R§r\nStandard symmetric encryption algorithm. Uses 128 bit keys, output is encoded in a special version of Base64 to permit transfer via Minecraft's chat. As a downside - messages will gain roughly 30% increase in length and the server might truncate them if they exceed the size limit.
items.zh: §lAES/CFB8+Base64R§r\n标准对称加密算法。使用128位密钥，输出以Base64的特殊版本编码，以允许通过Minecraft的聊天进行传输。有一个缺点是：消息长度将增加大约30%，如果超过长度限制，服务器可能会截断它们。

items.en: §lAES/GCM+Base64R§r\nMore security in exchange for a severe increase in message size (12 bytes for the initialization vector and 12 bytes for the authentication tag, Base64 encoding on top). Choose this if you value security over anything else.
items.zh: §lAES/GCM+Base64R§r\n更高的安全性，但是消息大小严重增加（12字节用于初始化向量，12字节用于身份验证标签，顶部为Base64编码）。是否选择取决于你是否重视安全而不是其他。

items.en: §lAES/ECB+Base64R§r\nConsiderably less secure than CFB mode, but saves you some bytes by not requiring the initialization vector. Still beats Caesar.
items.zh: §lAES/ECB+Base64R§r\n与CFB模式相比，安全性大大降低，但不需要初始化向量，从而节省了一些字节。仍然比Caesar安全。

items.en: §lCaesar§r\nMeme cipher. With this you're basically hoping that people will give up without even trying to decrypt your messages. That might be true in many cases, so the viability of using it depends on your threat model.\nThe key should be an integer from 1 to 1024. The shift is done by character code instead of alphabetically to ensure compatibility with any language.
items.zh: §lCaesar§r\n数字密码。有了这个，你基本上是希望人们会放弃，甚至不尝试解密你的消息。这在很多情况下可能是正确的，所以使用它的可行性取决于你的威胁模型。\n密钥应为从1到1024的整数。移位是按字符代码而不是按字母顺序进行的，以确保与任何语言兼容。

items.en: The server rejected the connection without a chat signing key.
items.zh: 服务器拒绝没有聊天签名密钥的连接。

items.en: Realms servers are not private. Realm owners cannot disable chat reporting and Mojang employs additional chat monitoring to identify potential \"online harms\" and escalate them to human review. If you are then found to violate Minecraft's Community Standards - even if the chat participants did not get offended - you will be banned, temporarily or permanently, from all multiplayer services. Usage of encryption is highly advised.
items.zh: Realms服务器不是私有的。Realm所有者不能禁用聊天举报，Mojang应用额外的聊天监控来识别潜在的“在线危害”，并将其上报给人类审查。如果你被发现违反了Minecraft的社区标准——即使聊天参与者没有受到冒犯——你将被暂时或永久禁止使用所有多人游戏服务。强烈建议使用加密。

items.en: This server requires all chat messages to be signed, which means they can be reported to Mojang, which may result in a ban from all multiplayer servers. This likely means that the server owner kept \"enforce-secure-profile\" enabled in the server.properties, which is the default since 1.19.1.\n\nClick \"Allow Signing\" to enable message signing for this session. You can also use the safety status button in the chat screen to select the signing mode for this server.
items.zh: 该服务器要求所有聊天消息都必须签名，这意味着它们可以被举报给Mojang，这可能会导致被禁止多人游戏。这可能意味着服务器在server.properties中启用了“enforce-secure-profile”，这是自1.19.1以来的默认设置。单击“允许签名”以启用此会话的消息签名。你还可以使用聊天屏幕中的安全状态按钮来为此服务器选择签名模式。

items.en: Don't show again during this session
items.zh: 在此会话期间不再显示

items.en: The server refused to deliver an unsigned message. You can enable chat signing by changing your signing mode or through a prompt screen.
items.zh: 服务器拒绝传递未签名的消息。你可以通过更改签名模式或通过提示屏幕来启用聊天签名。

items.en: This mode automatically enables message signing as soon as you enter the server, identically to how a vanilla client would.
items.zh: 这种模式将在你加入服务器时自动启用消息签名，与原版客户端的方式相同。

items.en: In this mode, messages are never signed and all server requests to sign them are ignored.
items.zh: 在这种模式下，消息永远不会被签名，任何服务器对它们的签名请求都会被忽略。

items.en: This mode indicates that your messages cannot be signed at all, either because you are using an offline account or because the client failed to fetch your signing keys from Mojang's service.
items.zh: 此模式表示你的消息根本无法签名，因为你使用的是离线帐户或客户端无法从Mojang的服务中获取你的签名密钥。

items.en: In this mode, messages are not signed by default, but if the server demands signing, you will be shown a pop-up screen where you can enable signing for one session.
items.zh: 在这种模式下，消息默认不会被签名，但如果服务器要求签名-你将会看到一个弹出屏幕，你可以在那里启用一个会话的签名。

items.en: Similar to prompt mode, but instead of showing a pop-up screen, signing will just be enabled automatically as soon as the server demands it.
items.zh: 与提示启用模式类似，但不显示弹出屏幕，如果服务器需要，签名将会自动启用。

items.en: Responsible for enabling most of the mod's client-sided functionality. Will require re-joining the server to take effect if toggled mid-session.
items.zh: 负责启用模组的大部分客户端功能。如果在会话中途切换，则需要重新加入服务器才能生效。

items.en: Adds a button that toggles most of the mod's client-sided functionality to the multiplayer menu.
items.zh: 添加一个按钮，可以在多人游戏菜单中切换模组大部分客户端功能的启用状态。

items.en: Sets the signing mode default for servers that force or allow chat signing.
items.zh: 为强制或允许聊天签名的服务器设置签名模式的默认值。

items.en: Adds a button for config reloading to the multiplayer menu.
items.zh: 在多人游戏菜单中添加一个重新加载配置的按钮。

items.en: Allows the mod to display special icon in the multiplayer menu for servers that have No Chat Reports or some other anti-chat-reporting measures installed.
items.zh: 允许模组在多人游戏菜单中为安装了No Chat Reports或采取了其他一些反聊天举报措施的服务器显示特殊图标。

items.en: Defines X-axis offset for rendering of \"Safe Server\" icon.
items.zh: 定义渲染“安全服务器”图标的X轴偏移。

items.en: Defines Y-axis offset for rendering of \"Safe Server\" icon.
items.zh: 定义渲染“安全服务器”图标的Y轴偏移。

items.en: §cBelow does not disable encryption, it only hides the button!
items.zh: §c下方选项不禁用加密，它只隐藏按钮！

items.en: Setting this to false will simply prevent the encryption button from being displayed in the chat screen. Be aware that encryption itself will not be automatically disabled along with the button.
items.zh: 将此设置为否只会阻止聊天屏幕中显示加密按钮。请注意，加密本身不会随按钮一起自动禁用。

items.en: Toggles the display of the encrypted message indicators in the form of a purple bar to the left and §5§l(§r§5ȯ§5§l)§r on hover to the right of the chat message.
items.zh: 切换加密消息指示符的显示，以紫色条的形式显示在聊天消息的左侧和§5§l(§r§5?§5§l)§r悬停显示在聊天消息的右侧。

items.en: Allows the client to display the server safety status in the bottom-right corner of the chat screen. The icon is hoverable for additional information.
items.zh: 允许客户端在聊天屏幕的右下角显示服务器安全状态。图标可悬停以获取更多信息。

items.en: §bClick here to read more about server safety levels
items.zh: §b单击此处阅读有关服务器安全级别的更多信息
隐藏未验证的消息指示符

items.en: Prevents the client from displaying unverified message indicators in the form of a gray bar to the left of the chat message.
items.zh: 阻止客户端在聊天消息左侧以灰色条的形式显示未验证的消息指示符。
隐藏修改的消息指示符

items.en: Prevents the client from displaying modified message indicators in the form of a gray bar to the left and §7§l(§r§7?§7§l)§r on hover to the right of the chat message.
items.zh: 阻止客户端在聊天消息的左侧以深灰色条的形式显示修改后的消息指示符，并在光标悬浮在消息右侧的图标上时显示原文。

items.en: Prevents the client from displaying system message indicators in the form of a gray bar to the left of the chat message.
items.zh: 阻止客户端在聊天消息左侧以灰色条的形式显示系统消息指示符。

items.en: Removes a warning toast that is displayed when entering servers with disabled §oenforce-secure-profile§r.
items.zh: 删除在加入禁用§oenforce-secure-profile§r的服务器时显示的警告提示弹窗。

items.en: Hides the chat message that is shown when the server requests the client to sign messages.
items.zh: 隐藏当服务器要求客户端签名消息时显示的聊天消息。

items.en: Prevents the client from ever showing the report button in the Social Interactions screen. This is disabled by default and the mod simply makes the button inactive on servers that have No Chat Reports installed, adding an explanation to the tooltip of the button.
items.zh: 防止客户端在社交屏幕中显示举报按钮。默认情况下禁用，模组只会在安装了No Chat Reports的服务器上使按钮无效，并在按钮的工具提示中添加说明。

items.en: Prevents the client from joining servers that don't have No Chat Reports installed.
items.zh: 阻止客户端加入未安装No Chat Reports的服务器。

items.en: Enables logging of certain debug information. This is generally useless for non-developers.
items.zh: 启用某些调试信息的日志记录。这对于非开发人员来说通常是无用的。

items.en: Allows the mod to disable built-in telemetry similar to how No Telemetry does.
items.zh: 允许模组禁用内置遥测，类似于No Telemetry。

items.en: Makes the server require all joining clients to have No Chat Reports installed.
items.zh: 使服务器要求所有加入的客户端都安装No Chat Reports。

items.en: The message that is displayed to a client if it tries to join the server without having No Chat Reports installed.
items.zh: 当客户端尝试加入未安装No Chat Reports的服务器时，显示在客户端的信息。

items.en: Makes the server convert all player messages into system messages. System messages don't have any signatures attached and cannot be reported; on unmodified clients they will display with a gray bar to the left.
items.zh: 使服务器将所有玩家消息转换为系统消息。系统消息没有附加任何签名，无法举报；在未修改的客户端上，它们将在左侧显示灰色条。

items.en: Allows the server to send additional data to the client when handling pings. This is used for displaying the \"Safe Server\" icon as well as some other technical purposes.
items.zh: 允许服务器在处理Ping时向客户端发送其他数据。这用于显示“安全服务器”图标以及其他一些技术用途。

items.en: A zoom mod that is powerful, lean, and pretty customizable. The zoom is yours!

items.zh: 禁用缩放时的电影镜头。

items.en: Uses the game's cinematic camera while zooming.
items.zh: 缩放时使用游戏的电影镜头。

items.en: Uses the cinematic camera with a configurable multiplier while zooming.
items.zh: 缩放时使用可配置倍数的电影镜头。

items.en: Divides the mouse sensitivity with the zoom divisor while zooming.
items.zh: 缩放时用缩放倍数除以鼠标灵敏度。

items.en: The zoom will abruptly transition between its on and off states.
items.zh: 缩放会在开启和关闭状态之间突然过渡。

items.en: The zoom will smoothly transition between its on and off states in a manner resembling the game's FOV transitions.
items.zh: 缩放会在开启和关闭状态之间平滑过渡，类似于游戏的FOV过渡。

items.en: The zoom will linearly transition between its on and off states.
items.zh: 缩放会在开启和关闭状态之间线性过渡。

items.en: Divides the amount of view bobbing with the zoom divisor while zooming.
The zoom will require the zoom key to be held.
items.zh: 需要按住缩放键进行缩放。

items.en: The zoom will be toggled by the zoom key.
The zoom will always be enabled, with the zoom key being used for zoom scrolling.
items.zh: 缩放始终开启，缩放键用于缩放滚动。

items.en: Allows to increase or decrease the zoom by scrolling with the mouse wheel.
items.zh: 允许通过鼠标滚轮增加或减少缩放。

items.en: The zoom will scroll in an exponential way, making zoom steps consistent. This may be harder to configure currently.
The zoom will scroll in an arbitrary way. This may be easier to configure currently, but scrolling may feel harder on higher zoom levels.
Adds zoom manipulation keys along with the zoom key. A game restart will be required in order to apply the changes.
items.zh: 添加与缩放键一起的缩放操作键。需要重启游戏以应用更改。

items.en: Uses a vignette as the zoom overlay. The vignette texture can be found at assets/ok_zoomer/textures/misc/zoom_overlay.png
items.zh: 使用晕影作为缩放覆盖层。晕影纹理可以在assets/ok_zoomer/textures/misc/zoom_overlay.png找到

items.en: Uses the spyglass overlay as the zoom overlay.
items.zh: 使用望远镜覆盖层作为缩放覆盖层。

items.en: Zooming won't require a spyglass and won't replace its zoom.
items.zh: 缩放不需要望远镜，也不会替换其缩放。

items.en: Zooming will require a spyglass in order to work. This option is configurable through the ok_zoomer:zoom_dependencies item tag.
items.zh: 缩放需要望远镜才能工作。此选项可通过ok_zoomer:zoom_dependencies物品标签进行配置。

items.en: Zooming will replace the spyglass zoom but it won't require one in order to work.
items.zh: 缩放将替换望远镜缩放，但不需要望远镜即可工作。

items.en: Zooming will act as a complete replacement of the spyglass zoom, requiring one to work and replacing its zoom as well.
items.zh: 缩放将完全替换望远镜缩放，需要望远镜才能工作并替换其缩放。

items.en: Determines the number to be used on the exponential curve. If unsure, keep this value at 2.
Determines the resolution of zoom scrolling. This will effectively multiply the amount of scroll steps.
The default scroll step to use on zooming in.
The maximum amount of scroll steps that the zoom may reach.
The multiplier used by the multiplied cinematic camera.
The divisor used to apply zoom to the FOV. A higher value means more zoom.
The minimum zoom divisor that you can scroll down.
items.zh: 你可以向下滚动的最小缩放倍数。

items.en: The maximum zoom divisor that you can scroll up.
items.zh: 你可以向上滚动的最大缩放倍数。

items.en: The number of steps between the zoom divisor and the minimum zoom divisor. Used by zoom scrolling.
items.zh: 缩放倍数和最小缩放倍数之间的步数。用于缩放滚动。

items.en: The number of steps between the zoom divisor and the maximum zoom divisor. Used by zoom scrolling.
items.zh: 缩放倍数和最大缩放倍数之间的步数。用于缩放滚动。

items.en: The factor used for smooth zoom transitions. A lower value means a smoother transition, a higher value means a faster one.
items.zh: 用于平滑缩放过渡的因子。数值越低表示过渡越平滑，数值越高表示过渡越快。

items.en: The value which the linear zoom transition step can reach.
If pressed, the \"Save Toolbar Activator\" keybind will be unbound if there's a conflict with the zoom key.
items.zh: 如果按下，当与缩放键冲突时，将解除“保存工具栏激活器”键位绑定。

items.en: Allows for resetting the zoom with the middle mouse button.
items.zh: 允许使用鼠标中键重置缩放。

items.en: Improves performance by making the game render less of the world while zoomed in. This feature depends on the Sodium mod in order to work.
Keeps the entity distance intact while zooming in. Creatures and certain blocks may not be visible from afar.
Expands the entity distance while zooming in, allowing creatures and certain blocks to be seen from afar. This will only be enabled if the Sodium mod is installed.
Expands the entity distance while zooming in, allowing creatures and certain blocks to be seen from afar. Without having Sodium installed, this may have a big performance impact during zoom.
If enabled, the current zoom divisor is forgotten once zooming is finished.
items.zh: 如果启用，缩放完成后将遗忘当前缩放倍数。

items.en: Adds the spyglass's sounds effects on zooming in and out.
Adds sound effects on zoom scrolling.
Displays debug information for exponential zoom scrolling. Currently it may help with configuring the zoom scrolling.
Prints a random owo in the console when the game starts.
items.zh: 游戏启动时在控制台中随机打印一个owo。

items.en: Reset to the default settings, which prioritizes a clean view.
Reset to a preset which prioritizes the game's interface over the view.
Reset to a preset that emulates the OptiFine zoom.
items.zh: 重置为模拟OptiFine缩放的预设。

items.en: Reset to a preset configured with the Persistent zoom mode in mind.
items.zh: 重置为以持久缩放模式为考虑的预设。

items.en: Reset to a preset that emulates the spyglass zoom.
items.zh: 重置为模拟望远镜缩放的预设。

items.en: Resets the settings to the selected preset.
items.zh: 将设置重置为所选预设。
资源包存在错误。请查看 logs/polytone.log
取代 Sodium 的选项屏幕

items.en: Replaces Sodium's Options Screen with intention of improving UX
items.zh: 替换 Sodium 的选项屏幕，旨在改善用户体验。

items.en: Also toggles the Stand controls HUD.

§oIn development§r

When your Stand is unsummoned, toggle the Stand controls HUD.

This way some of the some Stand abilities can be used while summoning only the arms of your Stand.
Toggle the controls HUD for your power other than a Stand (like Hamon or vampirism).
A default key for using the selected special ability.

A default key for changing the selected special ability.\n\nWhile holding this key, either press 1-9, use mouse wheel, or pick from the ability wheel (this can be disabled with the button to the left, or in the ROTP client settings).

When a power controls HUD is active, it rebinds some keys, like mouse buttons, to use ROTP abilities.\n\nHolding this key lets you disable this behavior, for example when you need Right Mouse Button to use an item.
A menu for ROTP mechanics, with things unlockable skills, further controls customization, Stand skins, etc.

items.zh: %1$s在于%2$s战斗的过程中耗尽了空气

items.en: Ripples of the Past client settings
Position of Energy, Stamina and Resolve bars in the HUD.
Position of Power name and action hotbars in the HUD.
How Power name and action names should render in the HUD.
Minimize HUD hotbars after an ability is selected.
Whether or not locked abilities show up in HUD hotbars as empty squares.
When selecting a special ability, a wheel where you can choose the ability with the mouse cursor will also appear on the screen.
A marker showing the current aim target (block/entity) of your Stand.
Enable ゴゴゴゴゴ particles when AFK.
Enables the visual effect at the beginning of time stop when its duration is 5 seconds or longer.
Whether your Stand is to the left or to the right of you when idle.
Enables humanoid Stand model's body tilt when the Stand is moving.

When your Stand is in front of you, the game only renders its arms to not block the view, and a glowing outline in a shape of the Stand. Disabling this setting with remove this outline and only keep the arms.
Whether or not voice lines of the JoJo characters whose powers the players use are played.
Render Hamon aura particles around players with Hamon energy
Render Hamon aura particles around the player's hand
Red eyes glowing in the dark in 3rd person when you have 80% or more energy
Right click to split into %s and %s
Left click on a %s to combine into %s

Attack non-passive targets with your Stand to build up Resolve meter. %s\nWhen the meter is full, you can enter True Resolve mode, which, in addition to the damage resistance, temporarily disables low stamina debuffs.
Higher Resolve gives resistance to all damage, up to 60%.
Stamina is spent on Stand abilities, and regenerates when the Stand is idle or is unsummoned.\n%s
Low stamina makes your Stand weaker, so use your abilities wisely.
During True Resolve, your Stand does not weaker from low stamina.

Using regular punches or barraging someone builds up the finisher meter, which is spent to make the heavy attack faster.\nWhen the first (white) bar is full, your heavy attack is replaced with a special finisher attack.
If you move your Stand beyond its effective range, it gets weaker.\nAs a rule of thumb, stronger Stands have much lower range, which limits their high power to melee combat.
This enables the controls of your Stand without immediately summoning it - some of the abilies let you summon just your Stand's arms this way.
Affects the physical damage from the Stand's attacks and, to a lesser extent, damage resistance from other Stand attacks.
Affects the Stand's attack speed, movement speed, projectile fire rate, and barrage hit count.
Combines effective range - the maximum range at which the Stand doesn't lose its strength, and the maximum range, beyond which the Stand cannot move at all.
Affects the stamina total and the Stand's damage resistance from other Stand attacks.
Increases the aiming capabilities of the Stand punches and projectile accuracy.
Shows how much more applications of the Stand's abilities this character is yet to discover. As the user learns more Stand skills, this stat decreases.
You and your Stand are too far away from each other
Your Stand is too slow to do this
A repeatable combo of fast and precise punches.
An extremely fast flurry of jabs.
A slower punch, dealing more damage and knockback.
A mighty charged attack, with immense damage and knockback.
Grab an entity or a placed block. Grabbed entity can be moved around and/or pummeled.
Throw the block held by your Stand as a makeshift ranged weapon.
Hold  while Stand is holding a block
Put all of your Stand's strength into throwing the grabbed enemy far away.
Hold  while Stand is grabbing an entity
Use your Stand's durability to guard against attacks from the front.
Directly control your Stand's movement within its maximum range.
A way to quickly give held items to your Stand, or put items its currently holding to your inventory.
Your Stand puts all its strength into a strong jump, propelling you from the ground.
Your Stand will try to grab a nearby ledge to prevent you from falling down.
A power-type Stand with exceptionally high physical strength, speed and precision. Being the same type of Stand as The World, at one point Star Platinum also awakens an ability to stop time.
A faster heavy attack variation that breaks guard and knocks the enemy upwards.
Star Platinum punches downwards, damaging all enemies caught in the shockwave. Any direct target of this attack is hammered into the ground.
Star Platinum's immense strength lets him grab a whole chunk of terrain and hurl it at an enemy.
After an uppercut, Star Platinum catches the enemy mid-air and throws them to the ground. A devastating finishing move.
Ctrl +  while the target is suspended

Star Platinum concentrates his strength in his middle and index fingers and extends them to a great length to deal damage at a higher distance. This can be performed even if Star Platinum is immobilized.
By inhaling the air with superhuman lung capacity, Star Platinum can pull entities in front of him towards himself.
Star Platinum stops the flow of time for a brief moment, allowing only you to act freely while time is frozen.
A long-range Stand with average physical strength, more suitable for reconnaissance than for close combat. Its body can unravel into tendrils, allowing the user to set up traps.
Hierophant Green uncoils his body and slides inside an entity, letting you mechanically control the target's movements.

One of the more physically strong power-type Stands, Crazy Diamond's ability is fixing objects and people. This ability has a multitude of various uses and makes the Stand very versatile, however, Crazy Diamond cannot heal the user's own wounds or cure any diseases.
After a finisher punch, incorrectly restore the attacked body part. This partially heals the injury, but leaves the target unable to correctly control that body part for a short period of time.
After punching a hole in the target's abdomen, leave a held item inside of them and partially heal the injury. Some items have special effects.
Revert a broken item to its original undamaged state. Any enchantments on the item are also reverted.
C on a damaged item in the inventory
Fix the damage and injuries of a damaged entity.
Revert the state of some entities and placed blocks. Examples include defusing TNTs and turning glass into sand.
Revert an item into the original component(s) it was crafted or smelted from.
Z on an item in the inventory
Fix blocks that were previously broken, as long as you have the items and experience that were dropped from the blocks.
Rather than restoring the original terrain, use broken blocks to create a thin wall in your look direction.

After punching a target with a finisher punch, if the impact from knockback breaks stone blocks, and the target is low on health, fuse the stone blocks with the target to turn them into a hideous rock resembling a face. The rock can be broken with a pickaxe.

Break a block and record its position within the dropped item, which will be considered an anchor. When holding the anchor and restoring it, you'll be able to transport to the original position of the anchor.
Crazy Diamond restructures a block held in your offhand into a sharp projectile and shoots it at a high speed.

A fast projectile made out of your blood. When it hits something, the blood drops remain on nearby entities - this helps you make your Block Bullets home in on them §7§o(by adding more of your blood drops on Block Bullets, and fixing the blood as the bullet is flying)§r.
You need to hold a block in your hand
You need a block made of a hard material
Render a mini (aka hidden) version of the overlay
items.zh: 资源包重新加载过程显示

items.en: Trim the rendering of the default overlay
Enable this if the window is flooded with color (mostly black)
What will be displayed on reloading
The text that will be displayed if TEXT is selected above

items.zh: 加载失败时重置资源包

items.en: Reinitializing the current screen after a reload
items.zh: 重新加载后重新初始化当前屏幕

items.en: Disabling this feature may eliminate the hang-up after the reload is complete
items.zh: 禁用此功能可能会消除重新加载完成后的挂起

items.en: Hide the overlay after the end
Early sending of status about server resourcepack
Some servers specifically wait for the player to load resources, because of this the game may be displayed incorrectly\nExample: You were underground while reloading resources
Reload resources again if an error occurs
Replaces the (Neo)Forge loading overlay with vanilla

Sodium Extra aims to bring most of OptiFine's eye-candy options to Sodium; in addition to providing some features such as visual bug fixes and other performance options that are not yet available on Sodium.
items.zh: Sodium Extra 旨在将大部分 OptiFine 中赏心悦目的选项带到 Sodium；此外，还提供一些功能，比如在 Sodium 中还没有提供的一些视觉错误修复和其他性能选项。

items.en: Features that shouldn't be in Sodium.
Attacking a villager in a village; when villagers can't breed because there aren't enough beds nearby or when a panda is attacked by a player on the village.‌
items.zh: 村民被玩家攻击、目睹玩家攻击熊猫、无法进行繁殖时产生的愤怒粒子

items.en: Naturally generated in soul sand valley biome environment.
items.zh: 在灵魂沙峡谷生物群系中飘散的颗粒

items.en: Barrier block displays when the player holds the Barrier item.
items.zh: 当玩家持有屏障时，屏障会显示。

items.en: Breaking blocks, sprinting, iron golems walking, armor stands, falling.
items.zh: 方块被摧毁、玩家疾跑、铁傀儡行走、盔甲架被摧毁、生物跌落于方块时产生的粒子

items.en: Entities in water, guardian laser beams, fishing.
items.zh: 水中的实体、守卫者激光、浮漂产生的气泡

items.en: Upward bubble columns made by soul sand under water.
items.zh: 水下灵魂沙产生的涌流气泡柱

items.en: Smoke produced by campfires and soul campfires.
items.zh: 营火和灵魂营火产生的烟雾

items.en: Smoke produced by campfires and soul campfires when above a hay bale.
items.zh: 放置在干草块上的营火/灵魂营火产生的烟雾

items.en: Falling petals from the cherry leaves.
items.zh: 开启或关闭樱花树叶花瓣飘落粒子效果

items.en: Clouds appear when entity completes death rotation animation and disappears.
items.zh: 实体死亡时产生的烟雾粒子

items.en: If enabled, composter particles are processed.
items.zh: 若启用，将显示堆肥桶粒子效果

items.en: A crimson particle generated in crimson forest biome environment.
items.zh: 在绯红森林生物群系中飘散的颗粒

items.en: Critical hits, fully charged bow shots, crossbows, evoker fangs.
items.zh: 玩家造成暴击、尖牙进行攻击、箭被射出时产生的粒子

items.en: Bubble column whirlpools made by magma blocks underwater.
items.zh: 水下岩浆块形成的涡流气泡柱

items.en: From mobs and players when hurt by a melee attack.
items.zh: 生物受到玩家近战攻击时产生的粒子
海豚游泳时产生的水花

items.en: An ender dragon's breath and dragon fireballs.
items.zh: 末影龙的龙息和末影龙火球

items.en: Dripping lava from the pointed dripstone.
items.zh: 滴水石锥渗出且未滴落的熔岩粒子。

items.en:
Adjusts the fog effect distance on the terrain per dimension. Disable Multi Dimension Fog to control fog using Single Fog

items.en: Use half the resolution on retina displays, vastly improving performance on macOS.\nModifying this option will require a game restart.

items.zh: 在叠加层上显示当前、最大、平均以及最小的 FPS。

items.en: Displays in additional information (max, average, and min FPS) alongside current FPS on the overlay.
items.zh: 在叠加层上显示当前 FPS 以及附加信息（最大、平均和最小 FPS）。

items.en:
Adjusts the fog effect distance on the terrain for all dimensions. Enable Multi Dimension Fog to control fog per dimension. 
0 - use vanilla fog settings

items.en:

- None: Default plain white text
- Background: Renders a background to the text like the debug menu
- Shadow: Plain white text with shadow
items.zh:
调整FPS/坐标的对比度。

- 阴影：有阴影的白色文本

items.en: If enabled, advancement and crafting recipe popups will be displayed.

items.en: If enabled, tutorial popups will be displayed.
items.zh: 启用后，将显示教程的弹窗提示。

items.en: If enabled, V-Sync will be able to swap mid-frame and disable itself at times, usually notably helping responsiveness. May cause issues with some GPU drivers.
items.zh: 启用后，垂直同步将能够交换中间帧，并有时禁用自己，通常有助于响应。可能会与一些GPU驱动程序发生问题。

items.en: If enabled, a fast random function will be used for block rendering. This can affect the rotation of randomly rotated textures when compared to vanilla.
items.zh: 启用后, 将使用快速随机函数来渲染方块。与原版相比, 这会影响随机旋转纹理的旋转方向。
建议: 安装Reese's Sodium Options

items.en: It is highly recommended you install Reese's Sodium Options alongside Sodium Extra. Due to the growing amount of features, it no longer fits properly on Sodium's video options.
items.zh: 强烈建议您在安装Sodium Extra的同时安装Reese's Sodium Options。由于越来越多的功能，它不再适合Sodium的视频设置。

items.en: The render distance controls how far away terrain will be rendered. Shorter distances mean that less terrain will be rendered, improving frame rates.
The simulation distance controls how far away terrain and entities will be loaded and ticked. Shorter distances can reduce the internal server's load and may improve frame rates.
Controls the minimum brightness in the world. When increased, darker areas of the world will appear brighter. This does not affect the brightness of already well-lit areas.
items.zh: 控制游戏的亮度（伽玛值）。

items.en: Sets the maximum scale factor to be used for the user interface. If \"auto\" is used, then the largest scale factor will always be used.
If enabled, the game will display in full-screen (if supported).

The monitor resolution and refresh rate to be used when in fullscreen mode. Changing this option may interfere with other applications and cause a delay when switching between applications.\n\nThis is only supported on the Windows operating system.

If enabled, the game's frame rate will be synchronized to the monitor's refresh rate, making for a generally smoother experience at the expense of overall input latency. This setting might reduce performance if your system is too slow.

Limits the maximum number of frames per second. This can help reduce battery usage and system load when multi-tasking. If VSync is enabled, this option will be ignored unless it is lower than your display's refresh rate.
If enabled, the player's view will sway and bob when moving around. Players who experience motion sickness while playing may benefit from disabling this.
Controls where the Attack Indicator is displayed on screen.
If enabled, an indicator will be shown when the game is saving the world to disk.
The default graphics quality controls some legacy options and is necessary for mod compatibility. If the options below are left to \"Default\", they will use this setting.
The quality level used for rendering clouds in the sky. Even though the options are labeled \"Fast\" and \"Fancy\", the effect on performance is negligible.
Controls the distance that weather effects, such as rain and snow, will be rendered.
items.zh: 控制雨雪效果的渲染质量。

items.en: Controls whether leaves will be rendered as transparent (fancy) or opaque (fast).
Controls the maximum number of particles which can be present on screen at any one time.
Enables the smooth lighting and shading of blocks in the world. This can very slightly increase the amount of time it takes to load or update a chunk, but it doesn't affect frame rates.

The distance (in blocks) which biome colors are smoothly blended across. Using higher values will greatly increase the amount of time it takes to load or update chunks, for diminishing improvements in quality.
The render distance multiplier used by entity rendering. Smaller values decrease, and larger values increase, the maximum distance at which entities will be rendered.
If enabled, basic shadows will be rendered beneath mobs and other entities.
If enabled, a vignette effect will be applied when the player is in darker areas, which makes the overall image darker and more dramatic.

Controls the number of mipmaps which will be used for block model textures. Higher values provide better rendering of blocks in the distance, but could adversely affect performance with resource packs that use many animated textures.

If enabled, only the faces of blocks which are facing the camera will be submitted for rendering. This can eliminate a large number of block faces very early in the rendering process, which greatly improves rendering performance. Some resource packs may have issues with this option, so try disabling it if you're seeing holes in blocks.

If enabled, chunks which are determined to be fully hidden by fog effects will not be rendered, helping to improve performance. The improvement can be more dramatic when fog effects are heavier (such as while underwater), but it may cause undesirable visual artifacts between the sky and fog in some scenarios.

If enabled, entities which are within the camera viewport, but not inside of a visible chunk, will be skipped during rendering. This optimization uses the visibility data which already exists for chunk rendering and does not add overhead.

items.zh: 仅对可见纹理进行动画处理

items.en: If enabled, only the animated textures which are determined to be visible in the current image will be updated. This can provide a significant performance improvement on some hardware, especially with heavier resource packs. If you experience issues with some textures not being animated, try disabling this option.
For debugging only. Specifies the maximum number of frames which can be in-flight to the GPU. Changing this value is not recommended, as very low or high values may create frame rate instability.

For debugging only. If enabled, persistent memory mappings will be used for the staging buffer so that unnecessary memory copies can be avoided. Disabling this can be useful for narrowing down the cause of graphical corruption.\n\nRequires OpenGL 4.4 or ARB_buffer_storage.

Specifies the number of threads to use for chunk building and sorting. Using more threads can speed up chunk loading and update speed, but may negatively impact frame times. The default value is usually good enough for all situations.

If enabled, rendering will never wait for chunk updates to finish, even if they are important. This can greatly improve frame rates in some scenarios, but it may create significant visual lag where blocks take a while to appear or disappear.
When enabled, the OpenGL context will be created with error checking disabled. This slightly improves rendering performance, but it can make debugging sudden unexplained crashes much harder.
The game must be restarted to apply one or more video settings!

Your NVIDIA graphics drivers are out of date!\n  * This will cause severe performance issues and crashes when Sodium is installed.\n  * Please update your graphics drivers to the latest version (version 536.23 or newer.)
The following resource packs are incompatible with Sodium:
The following resource packs may be incompatible with Sodium:
Check the game log for detailed information.
items.zh: 有关详细信息，请查看游戏日志。

items.en: The configuration file for Sodium has been corrupted, or is currently unreadable. Some options have been temporarily reset to their defaults. Please open the Video Settings screen to resolve this problem.
The config file has been reset to known-good defaults.
Disabling entities dynamic lighting is recommended with Canvas!
items.zh: 建议在使用Canvas时禁用实体动态光照！

items.en: Dynamic lighting with Canvas is currently performance heavy!
items.zh: 目前动态光照与Canvas同时使用会非常地吃性能！
启用方块实体的动态光照。

items.en:
Sets the Creeper dynamic lighting mode.
- %s disables Creeper dynamic lighting.
- %s sets a constant luminance.
- %s sets a dynamic luminance.
items.zh:
设置苦力怕的动态光照模式。
- %s 禁用苦力怕动态光照。
- %s 会设置一个恒定的亮度。
- %s 会设置动态的亮度。

items.en: Enables entities dynamic lighting. Note: players are always active.
items.zh: 启用实体动态光照。注：与玩家的设置相独立。

items.en: Enables dynamic lights. If enabled a player holding a torch will light up the area for example.
items.zh: 启用动态光照。若启用，手持光源的玩家将照亮其附近。

items.en: %s and %s will lag a bit behind but minimizes light updates.
items.zh: %s 和 %s 会略有延迟，以减少光照更新。

items.en: Enables first-person dynamic lighting. It's recommended to disable this if you're using shaders that has their own dynamic lighting.
items.zh: 启用第一人称动态光照。如果你使用自带动态光照的着色器，建议禁用该功能。

items.en:
Sets the TNT dynamic lighting mode.
- %s disables TNT dynamic lighting.
- %s sets a constant luminance.
- %s sets a dynamic luminance.
items.zh:
设置TNT的动态光照模式。
- %s 禁用TNT动态光照。
- %s 会设置一个恒定的亮度。
- %s 会设置动态的亮度。

items.en: Enables the water-sensitive light sources check. This means that some items will not emit light while being submerged in water.
items.zh: 启用水敏光源检查。这意味着某些物品被浸没在水中时将不会发光。

items.en: Configures the update rate for dynamic light sources
Enables first-person dynamic lighting. It's recommended to disable this if you're using shaders that has their own dynamic lighting.
If enabled, entities (such as mobs and dropped items) will have dynamic lighting.
If enabled, block entities will have dynamic lighting.
Enables the water-sensitive light sources check. This means that some items will not emit light while being submerged in water.
Configures the update rate for TNT lighting.
Configures the update rate for Creeper lighting.
items.zh: 配置苦力怕光照的更新频率。

Boolean function that returns true if the entity has the NBT tag x matching the query y.

y is equivalent to what comes after the '=' in the NBT random property.
e.g. 'nbt.1.SleepingX=exists:true' in the NBT property will be 'nbt(SleepingX,exists:true) in the animation function'.",

Interpolates smoothly between values based on the current frame 'k' and the keyframes. 'a' is 'k=0', 'b' is 'k=1', 'c' is 'k=2' etc.",
  "entity_model_features.config.function_explanation.keyframeloop": "keyframeloop(k, a, b, c,...)
Interpolates smoothly between values based on the current frame 'k' and the keyframes. 'a' is 'k=0', 'b' is 'k=1', 'c' is 'k=2' etc. but loops the animation back to frame 'a' when 'k' is greater than the number of keyframes",

  "entity_model_features.config.variable_explanation.model_part": "Model variables are specified in the format
 "<model>.<variable_name>"

The model can be:
 "this" - current custom model
 "part" - the original part model to which the custom model is attached
 "<part>" - original model by part name
 "<id>" - custom model by ID
 "<part>:<sub_id>:<sub_sub_id>:..." - (hierarchical) start with original model by part name, then find children by ID
 "<id>:<sub_id>:<sub_sub_id>:..." - (hierarchical) start with model by ID, then find children by ID

The first model found by part name or ID is used if there are duplicates.
The model search by ID is deep, also when used in a hierarchical specification. 

The hierarchical specification allows model groups (json part models) to be reused for different parts. 
For example one hand model ("shoulder:upper_arm:elbow:forearm:palm:finger[1.5]" can be used for both left and right hand.
The animation can use "left_hand:finger1" for the left thumb and "right_hand:finger1" for the right thumb. 
The intermediate parents in the hierarchical specification can be skipped. 

Variable names
 tx, ty, tz    - Translation x, y, z
 rx, ry, rz    - Rotation x, y, z
 sx, sy, sz    - Scale x, y, z
 visible       - Show model and submodels (boolean)
 visible_boxes - Show model only, does not affect submodels (boolean)",
